./  ADD  SSI=33090084,NAME=IGE0001F

ER3886A  CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@PROLOG  BALR  @06,0                                               0001 00004000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0001 00005000
         USING @PSTART,@06                                         0001 00006000
*                                                                  0081 00007000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00008000
*   /*                                                               */ 00009000
*   /* MAIN FLOW                                                     */ 00010000
*   /*                                                               */ 00011000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00012000
*                                                                  0081 00013000
*   EWAPTR=IOSERP;                  /* PTR FOR ERP WORK AREAY02870   */ 00014000
         L     EWAPTR,IOSERP(,IOSBPTR)                             0081 00015000
*   UCBPTR=IOSUCB;                  /* INIT PTR TO UCB Y02870        */ 00016000
         L     UCBPTR,IOSUCB(,IOSBPTR)                             0082 00017000
*   IOSERR=ON;                      /* INDICATE ERP IN CONTROLY02870 */ 00018000
*   IOSEX=ON;                       /* IND EXCEPTIONAL COND Y02870   */ 00019000
         OI    IOSERR(IOSBPTR),B'00100100'                         0084 00020000
*   IOBLD2=BOF;                     /* INIT LOAD 2 IND OFF           */ 00021000
         NI    IOBLD2(EWAPTR),B'11011111'                          0085 00022000
*CHNTYPE:                           /* DETERMINE CHAINING TYPE       */ 00023000
*   IF(IOSDCHN=ON&IOSCCHN=ON)|      /* MIXED CHAINING Y02870         */ 00024000
*       (CMDADR=CCWADR0&IOBS0B1=BOF)/* NORETRY INTRCPT YM2516        */ 00025000
*     THEN                          /* YES,                          */ 00026000
CHNTYPE  TM    IOSDCHN(IOSBPTR),B'11000000'                        0086 00027000
         BO    @RT00086                                            0086 00028000
         ICM   @15,7,CMDADR(IOSBPTR)                               0086 00029000
         BNZ   @RF00086                                            0086 00030000
         TM    IOBS0B1(IOSBPTR),B'01000000'                        0086 00031000
         BNZ   @RF00086                                            0086 00032000
@RT00086 DS    0H                                                  0087 00033000
*MXDCHAIN:                          /* ACTION FOR MXD CHAINING       */ 00034000
*     DO;                                                          0087 00035000
MXDCHAIN DS    0H                                                  0088 00036000
*       IOBPMS=ON;                  /* PRRM ERR MSG                  */ 00037000
         OI    IOBPMS(IOSBPTR),B'00000100'                         0088 00038000
*       IF STBYT2B5=ON|             /* CCC OR                        */ 00039000
*           STBYT2B6=ON             /* ICC                           */ 00040000
*         THEN                      /* ZERO OUT ERPIB ENTRY          */ 00041000
         TM    STBYT2B5(IOSBPTR),B'00000110'                       0089 00042000
         BZ    @RF00089                                            0089 00043000
*         ERPIB=ERPIB&&ERPIB;       /* ZERO OUT ENTRY Y02870         */ 00044000
         XC    ERPIB(8,EWAPTR),ERPIB(EWAPTR)                       0090 00045000
*       ELSE                                                       0091 00046000
*         ;                                                        0091 00047000
@RF00089 DS    0H                                                  0092 00048000
*     END;                                                         0092 00049000
*   ELSE                            /* NO,NOT MIXED CHAINING         */ 00050000
*     DO;                                                          0093 00051000
         B     @RC00086                                            0093 00052000
@RF00086 DS    0H                                                  0094 00053000
*FAILGCCW:                          /* POINT TO FAILING CCW          */ 00054000
*       CCWREG=CMDADR-CCWLEN;       /* POINT TO FAILING CCW          */ 00055000
FAILGCCW SR    CCWREG,CCWREG                                       0094 00056000
         ICM   CCWREG,7,CMDADR(IOSBPTR)                            0094 00057000
         SH    CCWREG,@CH00052                                     0094 00058000
*       IF IOSCCHN=ON&              /* COMMAND CHAINING Y02870       */ 00059000
*           IOSDCHN=BOF             /* Y02870                        */ 00060000
*         THEN                      /* YES,                          */ 00061000
         TM    IOSCCHN(IOSBPTR),B'01000000'                        0095 00062000
         BNO   @RF00095                                            0095 00063000
         TM    IOSDCHN(IOSBPTR),B'10000000'                        0095 00064000
         BNZ   @RF00095                                            0095 00065000
*         DO;                                                      0096 00066000
*           IF IOBERE=ON            /* ERP ENTERED PREVIOUS          */ 00067000
*             THEN                  /* YES,                          */ 00068000
         TM    IOBERE(EWAPTR),B'00010000'                          0097 00069000
         BNO   @RF00097                                            0097 00070000
*             IF CCWREG¬=IOSVST     /* DID SAME CMND FAIL Y02870     */ 00071000
*               THEN                /* NO,                           */ 00072000
         C     CCWREG,IOSVST(,IOSBPTR)                             0098 00073000
         BE    @RF00098                                            0098 00074000
*               DO;                 /* ZERO OUT                      */ 00075000
*                 IOSFLB=HEX0;      /* IOSB FLAG2 AND Y02870         */ 00076000
         MVI   IOSFLB(IOSBPTR),X'00'                               0100 00077000
*                 IOBCNT=HEX0;      /* ERROR COUNTERS                */ 00078000
         MVI   IOBCNT(EWAPTR),X'00'                                0101 00079000
*               END;                                               0102 00080000
*             ELSE                  /* NULL ELSE                     */ 00081000
*               ;                   /* SAME CMD FAILED-NO ACTN       */ 00082000
@RF00098 DS    0H                                                  0104 00083000
*           ELSE                    /* NO,ERP NOT ENTERED IND IT IS  */ 00084000
*             IOBERE=ON;            /* IND ERP ENTERED               */ 00085000
         B     @RC00097                                            0104 00086000
@RF00097 OI    IOBERE(EWAPTR),B'00010000'                          0104 00087000
*           WK1PTR=CCWREG;          /* POINT TO LAST CCW Y02870      */ 00088000
@RC00097 LR    WK1PTR,CCWREG                                       0105 00089000
*           GEN(LRA  WK1PTR,0(WK1PTR));/* POINT TO REAL CCW ADDR   0106 00090000
*                                      Y02870                        */ 00091000
         LRA  WK1PTR,0(WK1PTR)                                          00092000
*           IOSRST=WK1PTR;          /* STORE RESTART ADDRESS Y02870  */ 00093000
         ST    WK1PTR,IOSRST(,IOSBPTR)                             0107 00094000
*           IOBRSTRT=ON;            /* SET ON RESTART FLAG           */ 00095000
         OI    IOBRSTRT(EWAPTR),B'00000010'                        0108 00096000
*           IOSVST=CCWREG;          /* SET VIRTUAL RESTART ADDRESS 0109 00097000
*                                      YM2521                        */ 00098000
         ST    CCWREG,IOSVST(,IOSBPTR)                             0109 00099000
*         END;                                                     0110 00100000
*                                                                  0110 00101000
*/*                                                                  */ 00102000
*/* STSNCHCK SEGMENT-PRIORITY CHECK FOR STATUS BYTES UP TO UNIT      */ 00103000
*/*    CHECK                                                         */ 00104000
*/*                                                                  */ 00105000
*                                                                  0111 00106000
*STATUSCK:                          /* START STATUS CHECK WITH CCC   */ 00107000
*       IF STBYT2B5=ON|             /* CCC OR                        */ 00108000
*           STBYT2B6=ON             /* ICC                           */ 00109000
*         THEN                      /* YES,                          */ 00110000
@RF00095 DS    0H                                                  0111 00111000
STATUSCK TM    STBYT2B5(IOSBPTR),B'00000110'                       0111 00112000
         BZ    @RF00111                                            0111 00113000
*         DO;                       /* ATTEMPT RECOVERY              */ 00114000
*                                                                  0112 00115000
*/*                                                                  */ 00116000
*/* CCCICC SEGMENT- SETS UP ACTION TO BE TAKEN FOR CHANNEL CONTROL   */ 00117000
*/*    CHECK AND INTERFACE CONTROL CHECK STATUS ERRORS               */ 00118000
*/*                                                                  */ 00119000
*                                                                  0113 00120000
*CCCICC:                            /* ACTION FOR CCC OR ICC         */ 00121000
*           IOBPMS=ON;              /*                               */ 00122000
CCCICC   OI    IOBPMS(IOSBPTR),B'00000100'                         0113 00123000
*           IF IOSCOD¬=INTRCPT      /* INTERCEPT CONDITIONY02870     */ 00124000
*             THEN                  /* NO,DO RECOVERY ACTION         */ 00125000
         CLI   IOSCOD(IOSBPTR),X'7E'                               0114 00126000
         BE    @RF00114                                            0114 00127000
*             DO;                                                  0115 00128000
*               IF(IBSEQ=SQC001&    /* FIND ALL RETRY CONDITN        */ 00129000
*                   COMMAND¬=TIO)|  /* OR SYMBOL '|'                 */ 00130000
*                   (IBSEQ=SQC100&  /* DELIMITES RETRY               */ 00131000
*                   COMMAND¬=TIO)|  /* CONDITIONS                    */ 00132000
*                   (IBSEQ=SQC010&  /*                               */ 00133000
*                   COMMAND=EJECT)| /*                               */ 00134000
*                   (IBSEQ¬=SQC000& /* 4TH CONDITION                 */ 00135000
*                   IBSEQ¬=SQC110&  /*                               */ 00136000
*                   COMMAND¬=READ&  /*                               */ 00137000
*                   COMMAND¬=EJECT& /*                               */ 00138000
*                   COMMAND¬=TIO)   /*                               */ 00139000
*                 THEN              /* ONE OF ABOVE TESTS            */ 00140000
         TM    IBSEQ(EWAPTR),B'00000001'                           0116 00141000
         BNO   @GL00005                                            0116 00142000
         TM    IBSEQ(EWAPTR),B'00000110'                           0116 00143000
         BNZ   @GL00005                                            0116 00144000
         CLI   COMMAND(CCWREG),X'00'                               0116 00145000
         BNE   @RT00116                                            0116 00146000
@GL00005 TM    IBSEQ(EWAPTR),B'00000100'                           0116 00147000
         BNO   @GL00004                                            0116 00148000
         TM    IBSEQ(EWAPTR),B'00000011'                           0116 00149000
         BNZ   @GL00004                                            0116 00150000
         CLI   COMMAND(CCWREG),X'00'                               0116 00151000
         BNE   @RT00116                                            0116 00152000
@GL00004 TM    IBSEQ(EWAPTR),B'00000010'                           0116 00153000
         BNO   @GL00003                                            0116 00154000
         TM    IBSEQ(EWAPTR),B'00000101'                           0116 00155000
         BNZ   @GL00003                                            0116 00156000
         CLI   COMMAND(CCWREG),X'63'                               0116 00157000
         BE    @RT00116                                            0116 00158000
@GL00003 TM    IBSEQ(EWAPTR),B'00000111'                           0116 00159000
         BZ    @RF00116                                            0116 00160000
         TM    IBSEQ(EWAPTR),B'00000110'                           0116 00161000
         BNO   @GL00011                                            0116 00162000
         TM    IBSEQ(EWAPTR),B'00000001'                           0116 00163000
         BZ    @RF00116                                            0116 00164000
@GL00011 CLI   COMMAND(CCWREG),X'02'                               0116 00165000
         BE    @RF00116                                            0116 00166000
         CLI   COMMAND(CCWREG),X'63'                               0116 00167000
         BE    @RF00116                                            0116 00168000
         CLI   COMMAND(CCWREG),X'00'                               0116 00169000
         BE    @RF00116                                            0116 00170000
@RT00116 DS    0H                                                  0117 00171000
*                 IOBPMS=BOF;       /* LET RETRY OCCUR               */ 00172000
         NI    IOBPMS(IOSBPTR),B'11111011'                         0117 00173000
*               ELSE                                               0118 00174000
*                 ;                 /* NULL ELSE                     */ 00175000
@RF00116 DS    0H                                                  0119 00176000
*               IF STBYT2B6=ON      /* ICC                           */ 00177000
*                 THEN              /* YES,                          */ 00178000
         TM    STBYT2B6(IOSBPTR),B'00000010'                       0119 00179000
         BNO   @RF00119                                            0119 00180000
*                 IF IOBICCE=ON     /* ICC BEEN RETRIED              */ 00181000
*                   THEN            /* YES,                          */ 00182000
         TM    IOBICCE(EWAPTR),B'00001000'                         0120 00183000
         BNO   @RF00120                                            0120 00184000
*                   IOBPMS=ON;      /* PERM MSG                      */ 00185000
         OI    IOBPMS(IOSBPTR),B'00000100'                         0121 00186000
*                 ELSE              /* NO,                           */ 00187000
*                   IOBICCE=ON;     /* ALLOW 1 RETRY                 */ 00188000
         B     @RC00120                                            0122 00189000
@RF00120 OI    IOBICCE(EWAPTR),B'00001000'                         0122 00190000
*               ELSE                /* NO,                           */ 00191000
*                 IF IOBCCCE=ON     /* CCC BEEN RETRIED              */ 00192000
*                   THEN            /* YES,                          */ 00193000
         B     @RC00119                                            0123 00194000
@RF00119 TM    IOBCCCE(EWAPTR),B'00000100'                         0123 00195000
         BNO   @RF00123                                            0123 00196000
*                   IOBPMS=ON;      /* PERM MSG, NO RETRY            */ 00197000
         OI    IOBPMS(IOSBPTR),B'00000100'                         0124 00198000
*                 ELSE              /* NO,                           */ 00199000
*                   IOBCCCE=ON;     /* ALLOW 1 RETRY                 */ 00200000
         B     @RC00123                                            0125 00201000
@RF00123 OI    IOBCCCE(EWAPTR),B'00000100'                         0125 00202000
*             END;                                                 0126 00203000
*           ELSE                                                   0127 00204000
*             ;                     /* NULL ELSE                     */ 00205000
@RF00114 DS    0H                                                  0128 00206000
*           ERPIB=ERPIB&&ERPIB;     /* CLEAR OUT ERPIB               */ 00207000
@RC00114 XC    ERPIB(8,EWAPTR),ERPIB(EWAPTR)                       0128 00208000
*         END;                                                     0129 00209000
*       ELSE                        /* NEITHER CCC OR ICC            */ 00210000
*CDCCHECK:                          /* CHECK FOR CDC ERROR           */ 00211000
*         IF STBYT2B4=ON            /* CDC                           */ 00212000
*           THEN                    /* YES,                          */ 00213000
         B     @RC00111                                            0130 00214000
@RF00111 DS    0H                                                  0130 00215000
CDCCHECK TM    STBYT2B4(IOSBPTR),B'00001000'                       0130 00216000
         BNO   @RF00130                                            0130 00217000
*           IF IOBCDCE=ON           /* CDC BEEN RETRIED              */ 00218000
*             THEN                  /* YES,                          */ 00219000
         TM    IOBCDCE(EWAPTR),B'10000000'                         0131 00220000
         BNO   @RF00131                                            0131 00221000
*             IOBPMS=ON;            /* IND PERN ERR MSG              */ 00222000
         OI    IOBPMS(IOSBPTR),B'00000100'                         0132 00223000
*           ELSE                    /* NO,                           */ 00224000
*             IOBCDCE=ON;           /* IND RETRY ATTEMPT             */ 00225000
         B     @RC00131                                            0133 00226000
@RF00131 OI    IOBCDCE(EWAPTR),B'10000000'                         0133 00227000
*         ELSE                      /* NOT CCC,ICC, OR CDC           */ 00228000
*NOTOCCUR:                          /* SHOULD NOT OCCUR STATUS       */ 00229000
*           IF STBYT1B0=ON|         /* IS A SHOULD NOT OCCUR         */ 00230000
*               STBYT1B1=ON|        /* STATUS BIT ON                 */ 00231000
*               STBYT1B2=ON         /*                               */ 00232000
*             THEN                  /* YES,SHOULD NOT OCCUR IS ON    */ 00233000
         B     @RC00130                                            0134 00234000
@RF00130 DS    0H                                                  0134 00235000
NOTOCCUR TM    STBYT1B0(IOSBPTR),B'11100000'                       0134 00236000
         BZ    @RF00134                                            0134 00237000
*             IOBPMS=ON;            /* PERM ERR MSG                  */ 00238000
         OI    IOBPMS(IOSBPTR),B'00000100'                         0135 00239000
*           ELSE                    /* NOT CHAN ERR OR SHLD NT OC    */ 00240000
*UNITCHCK:                          /* UNIT CHECK OCCUR              */ 00241000
*             IF STBYT1B6=ON        /* UNIT CHECK                    */ 00242000
*               THEN                /* YES,CHECK SENSE BIT     SETTNG*/ 00243000
         B     @RC00134                                            0136 00244000
@RF00134 DS    0H                                                  0136 00245000
UNITCHCK TM    STBYT1B6(IOSBPTR),B'00000010'                       0136 00246000
         BNO   @RF00136                                            0136 00247000
*               IOBLD2=ON;                                         0137 00248000
         OI    IOBLD2(EWAPTR),B'00100000'                          0137 00249000
*             ELSE                  /* NONE OF ABOVE CHKD STATUS     */ 00250000
*               DO;                 /* CHK REMAINING STATUS          */ 00251000
*                                                                  0138 00252000
         B     @RC00136                                            0138 00253000
@RF00136 DS    0H                                                  0139 00254000
*/*                                                                  */ 00255000
*/*STATUSCK SEGMENT- COMPLETES THE PRIORITY CHECK BY TESTING FOR THE */ 00256000
*/*    STATUS ERRORS CHAINING CHECK,PROGRAM CHECK,PROTECTION CHECK,  */ 00257000
*/*    AND INCORRECT LENGTH.  IF NONE ON THEN ERROR IS CORRECTED.    */ 00258000
*/*                                                                  */ 00259000
*                                                                  0139 00260000
*PROGERRS:                          /* STATUS ERRS CAUSED BY PROG    */ 00261000
*                 IF STBYT2B7=ON|   /* CHAINING CHECK OR             */ 00262000
*                     STBYT2B2=ON|  /* PROGRAM CHECK OR              */ 00263000
*                     STBYT2B3=ON|  /* PROTECTION CHECK OR           */ 00264000
*                     STBYT2B1=ON   /* INCORRECT LENGTH              */ 00265000
*                   THEN            /* YES,                          */ 00266000
PROGERRS TM    STBYT2B7(IOSBPTR),B'01110001'                       0139 00267000
         BZ    @RF00139                                            0139 00268000
*                   IOBPMS=ON;      /* PERM ERR MSG                  */ 00269000
         OI    IOBPMS(IOSBPTR),B'00000100'                         0140 00270000
*                 ELSE              /* ERROR CORRECTED               */ 00271000
*                   IF STBYT1B7=ON  /* UNIT EXCEPTION                */ 00272000
*                     THEN          /* YES,                          */ 00273000
         B     @RC00139                                            0141 00274000
@RF00139 TM    STBYT1B7(IOSBPTR),B'00000001'                       0141 00275000
         BNO   @RF00141                                            0141 00276000
*                     IOSERR=BOF;   /* TURN OFF ERP IN CONTROL Y02870*/ 00277000
         NI    IOSERR(IOSBPTR),B'11011111'                         0142 00278000
*                   ELSE            /* NO,CONTINUE                   */ 00279000
*                     DO;           /*                               */ 00280000
         B     @RC00141                                            0143 00281000
@RF00141 DS    0H                                                  0144 00282000
*                       IOSERR=BOF; /* ERR RTN NOT IN CONTROL Y02870 */ 00283000
*                       IOSEX=BOF;  /* ERROR CORRECTED Y02870        */ 00284000
         NI    IOSERR(IOSBPTR),B'11011011'                         0145 00285000
*                       IOBRSTRT=BOF;/* RESET RESTART FLAG Y02870    */ 00286000
         NI    IOBRSTRT(EWAPTR),B'11111101'                        0146 00287000
*                       IOSFLB=HEX0;/* ZERO OUT FLAG2 Y02870         */ 00288000
         MVI   IOSFLB(IOSBPTR),X'00'                               0147 00289000
*                       IOBCNT=HEX0;/* ZERO OUT RETRY FLAGS Y02870   */ 00290000
         MVI   IOBCNT(EWAPTR),X'00'                                0148 00291000
*                       EWACNTR1=ZERO;/* ZERO SDR TABLE INDEX Y02870 */ 00292000
         MVI   EWACNTR1(EWAPTR),X'00'                              0149 00293000
*                     END;                                         0150 00294000
*               END;                                               0151 00295000
@RC00141 DS    0H                                                  0151 00296000
@RC00139 DS    0H                                                  0152 00297000
*     END;                                                         0152 00298000
*                                                                  0152 00299000
@RC00136 DS    0H                                                  0152 00300000
@RC00134 DS    0H                                                  0152 00301000
@RC00130 DS    0H                                                  0152 00302000
@RC00111 DS    0H                                                  0153 00303000
*/*                                                                  */ 00304000
*/* EXITCODE SEGMENT-                                                */ 00305000
*/* ONE OF THE FOLLOWING EXITS MAY BE TAKEN                          */ 00306000
*/*     A) WTO MODULE FOR MSG AND POSSIBLE LOGOUT                    */ 00307000
*/*     B) OBR MODULE FOR LOGOUT AND POSSIBLE RETRY                  */ 00308000
*/*     C) IOS FOR RETRY OR ERROR CORRECTED                          */ 00309000
*/*                                                                  */ 00310000
*                                                                  0153 00311000
*EXITHERE:                          /* CODE TO TAKE RIGHT EXIT       */ 00312000
*   IF IOBPMS=ON                    /* WTO ROUTINE NEEDED            */ 00313000
*     THEN                          /* YES,                          */ 00314000
@RC00086 DS    0H                                                  0153 00315000
EXITHERE TM    IOBPMS(IOSBPTR),B'00000100'                         0153 00316000
         BNO   @RF00153                                            0153 00317000
*     DO;                           /*                               */ 00318000
*       IOSERR=BOF;                 /* ERP NO LONGER IN CONTROL    0155 00319000
*                                      YM2514                        */ 00320000
         NI    IOSERR(IOSBPTR),B'11011111'                         0155 00321000
*       XCTLPR=WTORTN;              /* LOAD RTN NUMBER FOR XCTL      */ 00322000
         LA    XCTLPR,253                                          0156 00323000
*       XCTLRG=CVTXTLER;            /* LOAD XCTL ADDR FOR XCTL       */ 00324000
         L     @12,CVTPTR                                          0157 00325000
         L     @12,CVTXTLER(,@12)                                  0157 00326000
         LR    XCTLRG,@12                                          0157 00327000
*       GO TO XCTL;                 /* BRANCH TO XCTL ROUTINE        */ 00328000
         BR    @12                                                 0158 00329000
*     END;                          /*                               */ 00330000
*   ELSE                                                           0160 00331000
*     ;                             /* NULL ELSE                     */ 00332000
@RF00153 DS    0H                                                  0161 00333000
*   IF IOBLD2=ON                    /* 2ND LOAD NEEDED               */ 00334000
*     THEN                          /* YES,XCTL TO NEXT LOAD         */ 00335000
         TM    IOBLD2(EWAPTR),B'00100000'                          0161 00336000
         BNO   @RF00161                                            0161 00337000
*     DO;                                                          0162 00338000
*       XCTLPR=LOAD2;               /* 2ND ERP ID                    */ 00339000
         LA    XCTLPR,1016                                         0163 00340000
*       XCTLRG=CVTXTLER;            /* XCTL ADDR                     */ 00341000
         L     @12,CVTPTR                                          0164 00342000
         L     @12,CVTXTLER(,@12)                                  0164 00343000
         LR    XCTLRG,@12                                          0164 00344000
*       GO TO XCTL;                 /* XCTL                          */ 00345000
         BR    @12                                                 0165 00346000
*     END;                                                         0166 00347000
*   ELSE                                                           0167 00348000
*     ;                                                            0167 00349000
@RF00161 DS    0H                                                  0168 00350000
*   GENERATE;                                                      0168 00351000
ERREXCP  EQU   15                      ERROR EXCP                       00352000
RETURN   EQU   3                       RETURN                           00353000
         SVC   ERREXCP                 ERROR EXCP                       00354000
         SVC   RETURN                   RETURN                          00355000
*   END ER3886A                                                    0169 00356000

*STRTCHCK:                          /* START SENSE CHECKING          */ 00030000
*   IF IOBS0B5=ON|                  /* NOT USED SENSE ON OR          */ 00031000
*       IOBS0B4=ON|                 /* NON INIT OR                   */ 00032000
*       IOBS0B7=ON|                 /* RCP ERROR                     */ 00033000

*                                      ACTION                        */ 00035000

         BNZ   @RT00109                                            0109 00037000

*     DO;                                                          0110 00041000
*       IOBOBR=ON;                  /* OBR NEEDED                    */ 00042000
*       IOBPMS=ON;                  /* PERM ERR MSG                  */ 00043000

*       IF IOBS0B6=ON&              /* NONINIT                       */ 00045000

*                   ELSE                                           0178 00309000
*                     ;             /* NULL ELSE                     */ 00310000
@RF00176 DS    0H                                                  0179 00311000
*                 END;                                             0179 00312000
*               ELSE                /* NOT INT REQ,CONTINUE PRIO     */ 00313000
*BUSOUT:                            /* TEST FOR BUS OUT              */ 00314000
*                 IF IOBS0B2=ON     /* BUS OUT CHECK                 */ 00315000
*                   THEN            /* YES,PROCESS BUSOUT            */ 00316000
         B     @RC00160                                            0180 00317000

         BNO   @RF00180                                            0180 00320000
*/*                                                                  */ 00321000
*/* BUSOUT SEGMENT- SETS UP ACTION FOR BUSOUT SENSE INDICATION       */ 00322000
*/*                                                                  */ 00323000
*                                                                  0181 00324000
*                   DO;                                            0181 00325000
*                     IOBOBR=ON;    /* LOGOUT NEEDED                 */ 00326000

*                   END;                                           0186 00338000

*CMDRINVF:                          /* COMMD REJ OR INV FORMAT       */ 00340000
*                   IF IOBS0B0=ON|  /* COMMAND REJECT                */ 00341000
*                       IOBS1B2=ON  /* INVALID FORMAT                */ 00342000

*                     DO;           /*                               */ 00354000

@RC00137 DS    0H                                                  0193 00367000

*                                                                  0194 00369000
*/*                                                                  */ 00370000
*/* EXITCODE SEGMENT-                                                */ 00371000
*/* ONE OF THE FOLLOWING EXITS MAY BE TAKEN                          */ 00372000
*/*     A) WTO MODULE FOR MSG AND POSSIBLE LOGOUT                    */ 00373000
*/*     B) OBR MODULE FOR LOGOUT AND POSSIBLE RETRY                  */ 00374000
*/*     C) IOS FOR RETRY OR ERROR CORRECTED                          */ 00375000
*/*                                                                  */ 00376000
*/* SDROBRCK SEGMENT- UPDATES SDR COUNTER WHEN INDICATED AND SETS UP */ 00377000
*/*    OBR LOGOUT RECORD WHEN INDICATED                              */ 00378000
*                                                                  0194 00379000
*   EWADDISP=ADDR(EWCOBR);          /* POINTER TO OBR INFO Y02870    */ 00380000

*   EWADCNT='08'X;                  /* OBR COUNT IS 8 BYTES Y02870   */ 00383000

*   IF SDRINDEX¬=ZERO|              /* SDR TO BE UPDATED             */ 00385000

./  ADD  SSI=40500168,NAME=IGG019LS
         TITLE 'IGG019LS,3886 CHECK MODULE                             *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IGG019LS CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@PROLOG  DS    0H                                                  0002 00004000
ODDSADSP EQU   20                       SAVE AREA DISP FOR STM          00005000
ZERO     EQU   0                        ZERO EQUATE                     00006000
         STM   RETR,WRKR3,ODDSADSP(SAVR)  SAVE USER REGS                00007000
         BALR  BASR,ZERO                  SETUP BASE REG                00008000
CHCK3886 DS    0H                                                       00009000
         USING CHCK3886,BASR           ESTABLISH ADDRESSABILITY         00010000
*   DECBR=PARR;                     /* LOAD DECB ADDR FROM REG 1     */ 00011000
         LR    DECBR,PARR                                          0031 00012000
*   IOBR=DECIOBPT;                  /* LOAD IOB ADDR                 */ 00013000
         L     IOBR,DECIOBPT(,DECBR)                               0032 00014000
*   DCBR=DECDCBAD;                  /* LOAD PTR TO DCB               */ 00015000
         L     DCBR,DECDCBAD(,DECBR)                               0033 00016000
*/* WAIT FOR COMPLETION OF READ COMMAND                              */ 00017000
*                                                                  0034 00018000
*   DO WHILE(ECBBYT=NOTCOMPL);      /* IF READ NOT COMPL,WAIT        */ 00019000
         B     @DE00034                                            0034 00020000
@DL00034 DS    0H                                                  0035 00021000
*     GEN;                                                         0035 00022000
         WAIT  ECB=(1)                  WAIT ON ECB                     00023000
*   END;                                                           0036 00024000
*                                                                  0036 00025000
@DE00034 TM    ECBBYT(DECBR),B'01111111'                           0036 00026000
         BZ    @DL00034                                            0036 00027000
*/* CALL PROBLEM DETERMINATION FOR INVALID DECB                      */ 00028000
*                                                                  0037 00029000
*   IF DECRDSF=OFF|                 /* RBL TYPE READ                 */ 00030000
*       DECWRSFR=OFF                /*                               */ 00031000
*     THEN                          /* YES,GOTO PROBLEM DETERMNTN    */ 00032000
         TM    DECRDSF(DECBR),B'10000001'                          0037 00033000
         BO    @RF00037                                            0037 00034000
*     DO;                                                          0038 00035000
*       GEN;                                                       0039 00036000
         DMABCOND 201,DCB=(DCBR),SVC=YES                                00037000
*     END;                                                         0040 00038000
*   IF DECAREA=NOADDR|              /* LIST-EXECUTE AND NO ADDRES    */ 00039000
*       DECBHDRA=NOADDR             /*                               */ 00040000
*     THEN                          /* YES,GOTO PROB DETERMINATN     */ 00041000
@RF00037 SLR   @07,@07                                             0041 00042000
         C     @07,DECAREA(,DECBR)                                 0041 00043000
         BE    @RT00041                                            0041 00044000
         C     @07,DECBHDRA(,DECBR)                                0041 00045000
         BNE   @RF00041                                            0041 00046000
@RT00041 DS    0H                                                  0042 00047000
*     DO;                                                          0042 00048000
*       GEN;                                                       0043 00049000
         DMABCOND 200,DCB=(DCBR),SVC=YES                                00050000
*     END;                                                         0044 00051000
*                                                                  0044 00052000
*/* FOR GOOD COMPLETION OF ECB MOVE DATA TO USER                     */ 00053000
*                                                                  0045 00054000
*   IF ECBBYT=GOODEND               /* READ HAD GOOD COMPLETION      */ 00055000
*     THEN                          /* YES,MOVE DATA TO USER         */ 00056000
@RF00041 TM    ECBBYT(DECBR),B'01111111'                           0045 00057000
         BNO   @RF00045                                            0045 00058000
*/*                                                                  */ 00059000
*/* MOVERTN SEGMENT-MOVES THE DATA TO THE USERS DATA AREA AND CONTROL*/ 00060000
*/*    INFORMATION TO THE USER'S HEADER AREA                         */ 00061000
*/*                                                                  */ 00062000
*                                                                  0046 00063000
*MOVERTN:                           /* LABEL FOR MOVE ROUTINE        */ 00064000
*     DO;                                                          0046 00065000
MOVERTN  DS    0H                                                  0047 00066000
*       USERDATA(1:DCBBLKSI)=DATA3886;/* MOVE DATA TO USERS AREA     */ 00067000
         L     @07,DECAREA(,DECBR)                                 0047 00068000
         LH    @06,DCBBLKSI+52(,DCBR)                              0047 00069000
         BCTR  @06,0                                               0047 00070000
         EX    @06,@SM00679                                        0047 00071000
*       USERHDR=HDR3886;            /* GIVE USER HEADER              */ 00072000
         L     @07,DECBHDRA(,DECBR)                                0048 00073000
         MVC   USERHDR(20,@07),HDR3886(IOBR)                       0048 00074000
*       IF LII3886=ENDOFPAG         /* END OF PAGE IN HEADER         */ 00075000
*         THEN                      /* YES TURN ON EOP BIT           */ 00076000
         CLI   LII3886(IOBR),C'5'                                  0049 00077000
         BNE   @RF00049                                            0049 00078000
*         DCBEOPFG=ON;              /* IN DCB                        */ 00079000
         OI    DCBEOPFG+4(DCBR),B'10000000'                        0050 00080000
*       DRCD3886=DRCD3886&&DRCD3886;/* ZERO OUT INPUT AREA           */ 00081000
@RF00049 XC    DRCD3886(150,IOBR),DRCD3886(IOBR)                   0051 00082000
*       RETR=SAVE14;                /* HAVE RETURN INLINE AFTER CHECK   00083000
*                                      MACRO                         */ 00084000
         L     RETR,SAVE14(,SAVR)                                  0052 00085000
*     END;                                                         0053 00086000
*   ELSE                            /* NO,PROCESS ERROR CONDITION    */ 00087000
*/*                                                                  */ 00088000
*/* ERRCOND SEGMENT-ISSUES EOV MACRO(SVC 55),BALR TO SYNAD FOR PERM  */ 00089000
*/*     ERRORS,REISSUE EOV MACRO TO FLIP FLAGS                       */ 00090000
*/*                                                                  */ 00091000
*                                                                  0054 00092000
*ERRCOND:                           /* LABEL FOR ERROR CONDITION     */ 00093000
*     DO;                                                          0054 00094000
         B     @RC00045                                            0054 00095000
@RF00045 DS    0H                                                  0054 00096000
ERRCOND  DS    0H                                                  0055 00097000
*       SYNADR=IOBR-EIGHT;          /* LOAD REG 0 FOR IGG0005E     0055 00098000
*                                      POINTING TO THE SAM IOB       */ 00099000
         LR    SYNADR,IOBR                                         0055 00100000
         SH    SYNADR,@CH00050                                     0055 00101000
*       PARR=DCBR;                  /* SETUP DCB POINTER             */ 00102000
         LR    PARR,DCBR                                           0056 00103000
*       GEN;                                                       0057 00104000
ODSADSP3 EQU   64                      DISPLACEMENT TO END OF SAVE AREA 00105000
         STM   SYNADR,PARR,ODSADSP3(SAVR) SAVE DCB AND IOB POINTERS     00106000
         EOV   ZERO(PARR)                 GOTO SYNAD/EOV PROCESSOR      00107000
*       CALL SYNADRTN;              /* GEN BALR TO SYNAD ROUTINE     */ 00108000
         BALR  @14,@15                                             0058 00109000
*       GEN;                                                       0059 00110000
         LA    ENTR,ZERO(ENTR)          ZERO HIGH ORDER BYTE OF REG 15  00111000
*       CHKRG8=ENTR;                /* SAVE CONTENTS OF REG 15 -SYNAD   00112000
*                                      WILL INDICATE ACTN            */ 00113000
         ST    ENTR,CHKRG8(,SAVR)                                  0060 00114000
*       GEN;                                                       0061 00115000
         LM    SYNADR,PARR,ODSADSP3(SAVR) RESTORE DCB AND IOB FOR EOV   00116000
         EOV   ZERO(PARR)                 GOTO RESOLVE PURGED IOB S     00117000
*       IF WRKR3¬=ZEROREG&WRKR3¬=DCBSYNA/* TST IF CNAD SUP BC ADDR   */ 00118000
*         THEN                      /* YES,                          */ 00119000
         LTR   WRKR3,WRKR3                                         0062 00120000
         BZ    @RF00062                                            0062 00121000
         SLR   @07,@07                                             0062 00122000
         ICM   @07,7,DCBSYNA+52(DCBR)                              0062 00123000
         CR    WRKR3,@07                                           0062 00124000
         BE    @RF00062                                            0062 00125000
*         RETR=WRKR3;               /* PUT ADDR IN RETURN REG        */ 00126000
         LR    RETR,WRKR3                                          0063 00127000
*       ELSE                        /* NO,                           */ 00128000
*         RETR=SAVE14;              /* GET ADD AFTER CHECK           */ 00129000
         B     @RC00062                                            0064 00130000
@RF00062 L     RETR,SAVE14(,SAVR)                                  0064 00131000
*     END;                                                         0065 00132000
@RC00062 DS    0H                                                  0066 00133000
*   GEN;                                                           0066 00134000
@RC00045 DS    0H                                                  0066 00135000
ODSADSP2 EQU   24                       DISPLACEMENT TO REG 15          00136000
         LM    ENTR,WRKR3,ODSADSP2(SAVR)  RESTORE USER REGS             00137000
*   END IGG019LS                                                   0067 00138000
*                                                                  0067 00139000

@EL00001 DS    0H                                                  0067 00152000
@EF00001 DS    0H                                                  0067 00153000

./  ADD  SSI=33380073,NAME=IGG0196R
         TITLE 'IGG0196R,3886 OPEN STAGE I MODULE                      *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IGG0196R CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@PROLOG  BALR  @03,0                                               0001 00004000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0001 00005000
         USING @PSTART,@03                                         0001 00006000
RBPRFXLN EQU 64                                                         00007000
RBPRFLNA EQU 32                                                         00008000
PRBLEN   EQU 136                                                        00009000
SIRBLEN  EQU 200                                                        00010000
TIRBLEN  EQU 136                                                        00011000
IRBLEN   EQU 128                                                        00012000
SVRBLEN  EQU 200                                                        00013000
         USING  FORCORE,RCORE                                           00014000
*                                                            @YM02506*/ 00015000
         USING  WTG,RWTG                                                00016000
*   DO WHILE(WTGID¬=OPIDCNST);      /* NOT END OF W-T-G TABLE        */ 00017000
         B     @DE00075                                            0075 00018000
@DL00075 DS    0H                                                  0076 00019000
*     IF WTGID=AMIDCNST             /* THIS MODULE NEEDED            */ 00020000
*       THEN                        /* YES,PROCESS FOR THIS DEV      */ 00021000
         CLC   WTGID(2,RWTGC),@CC01613                             0076 00022000
         BNE   @RF00076                                            0076 00023000
*       DO;                                                        0077 00024000
*         RDCB=DCBADDR;             /* INIT DCB POINTER              */ 00025000
         SLR   RDCB,RDCB                                           0078 00026000
         ICM   RDCB,7,DCBADDR(RPARC)                               0078 00027000
*         RCORE=OWAADDR;            /* INIT OPEN WORK AREA POINTR    */ 00028000
         SLR   RCORE,RCORE                                         0079 00029000
         ICM   RCORE,7,OWAADDR(RWTGC)                              0079 00030000
*         DEBPTR=DCBDEBAD;          /* GET DEB ADDRESS Y02870        */ 00031000
         L     @14,DCBDEBAD+40(,RDCB)                              0080 00032000
         ST    @14,DEBPTR                                          0080 00033000
*         TCBPTR=DEBTCBAD;          /* GET TCB ADDRESS Y02870        */ 00034000
         L     TCBPTR,DEBTCBAD(,@14)                               0081 00035000
*/*                                                                  */ 00036000
*/* PRCESSXX - GETMAIN 2K FOR FR TABLE,FILL IN TABLE,INITIALIZE DCB, */ 00037000
*/*             SETUP SETDEV LIST FORM, ISSUE SETDEV E-FORM MACRO    */ 00038000
*/*                                                                  */ 00039000
*/* GETMAIN 2K TO CONTAIN FRID TABLE AND FORMAT RECORDS              */ 00040000
*                                                                  0082 00041000
*GETFRTAB:                          /* LABEL FOR GETMAIN OF TABLE    */ 00042000
*         DO;                       /* MODESET KEYADDR(DXUKEY)     0082 00043000
*                                      WORKREG(RJ)                   */ 00044000
GETFRTAB DS    0H                                                  0083 00045000
*           RJ=DXUKEY;              /* GET KEY FORM SAVE LOCATION    */ 00046000
         SLR   RJ,RJ                                               0083 00047000
         IC    RJ,DXUKEY                                           0083 00048000
*           SPKA(RJ);               /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 00049000
         SPKA  0(RJ)                                               0084 00050000
*         END;                      /* MODESET KEYADDR(DXUKEY)     0085 00051000
*                                      WORKREG(RJ) GET USER KEY    0085 00052000
*                                                            @YM02506*/ 00053000
*         GENERATE;                                                0086 00054000
    GETMAIN R,LV=2048,SP=250                                            00055000
*INITTABL:                          /* INIT TABLE AND DCB            */ 00056000
*         FRTABARE=FRTABARE&&FRTABARE;/* ZERO OUT TABLE              */ 00057000
INITTABL XC    FRTABARE(64,RF),FRTABARE(RF)                        0087 00058000
*/* FILL IN ADDRESS IN TABLE                                         */ 00059000
*                                                                  0088 00060000
*         FRADDR(1)=ADDR(FRENTRY(1));/* FILL IN 1ST ADDR ELEMENT     */ 00061000
         LA    @14,FRENTRY(,RF)                                    0088 00062000
         ST    @14,FRADDR(,RF)                                     0088 00063000
*         DO RB=TWO TO EIGHT;       /* FILL IN 2ND TO EIGTH ELEMT    */ 00064000
         LA    RB,2                                                0089 00065000
@DL00089 DS    0H                                                  0090 00066000
*           FRADDR(RB)=FRADDR(RB-ONE)+FRTBLTH;/* INIT TABLE ADRESSES */ 00067000
         LR    @14,RB                                              0090 00068000
         SLA   @14,3                                               0090 00069000
         LA    @11,240                                             0090 00070000
         LR    @10,RF                                              0090 00071000
         AL    @10,@CF01706                                        0090 00072000
         AL    @11,FRADDR(@14,@10)                                 0090 00073000
         AL    @14,@CF01707                                        0090 00074000
         ST    @11,FRADDR(@14,RF)                                  0090 00075000
*         END;                                                     0091 00076000
         AH    RB,@CH00044                                         0091 00077000
         CH    RB,@CH00051                                         0091 00078000
         BNH   @DL00089                                            0091 00079000
*         FRTABEND=TABEND;          /* INDICATE END OF TABLE         */ 00080000
         MVC   FRTABEND(4,RF),@CB01619                             0092 00081000
*         DO;                       /* MODESET EXTKEY(DATAMGT)       */ 00082000
*           SPKA(80);               /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 00083000
         LA    @14,80                                              0094 00084000
         SPKA  0(@14)                                              0094 00085000
*         END;                      /* MODESET EXTKEY(DATAMGT) GET 0095 00086000
*                                      DATA MANAGEMENT KEY Y02870    */ 00087000
*/* INITIALIZE DCB FIELDS                                            */ 00088000
*                                                                  0096 00089000
*         DCBLNNUM=ZERO;            /* INIT LINE NO TO 0             */ 00090000
         LA    @14,4                                               0096 00091000
         ALR   @14,RDCB                                            0096 00092000
         MVI   DCBLNNUM(@14),X'00'                                 0096 00093000
*/*                                                          @YM02506*/ 00094000
*/*THIS ROUTINE WILL GET THE USER PROTECT KEY AND PUT IT IN  @YM02506*/ 00095000
*/*THE HIGHER ORDER BYTE OF THE 'DCBFRTAB' SO THAT  'SETDEV' @YM02506*/ 00096000
*/*                              IGG08108                    @YM02506*/ 00097000
*/*WILL BE ABLE TO GET THE USER PROTECT KEY.THIS IS STRICTLY @YM02506*/ 00098000
*/*A 'VS/2 RELEASE/2' CODE GHANGE OR ANY FOLLOW ON RELEASE   @YM02506*/ 00099000
*/*OF 'VS/2'                                                 @YM02506*/ 00100000
*/*                                                          @YM02506*/ 00101000
*                                                                  0097 00102000
*         PROTCKEY=RF;              /* PUT FRT TABLE ADDR IN WORKAREA   00103000
*                                                            @YM02506*/ 00104000
         ST    RF,PROTCKEY                                         0097 00105000
*         UPROCKEY=DXUKEY;          /* PUT USER PROTECT IN HIGHER  0098 00106000
*                                      BYTE OF FRT           @YM02506*/ 00107000
         MVC   UPROCKEY(1),DXUKEY                                  0098 00108000
*         RF=PROTCKEY;              /* GET USER KEY + FORMAT TABLE 0099 00109000
*                                      ADDR INTO             @YM02506*/ 00110000
*                                                                  0099 00111000
         L     RF,PROTCKEY                                         0099 00112000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00113000
*         /*                                                         */ 00114000
*         /* REGISTER 1 SO THAT THE USER PROTECT MAY BE      @YM02506*/ 00115000
*         /* STORED IN THE DCB LABEL 'DCBFRTAB'              @YM02506*/ 00116000
*         /*                                                         */ 00117000
*         /***********************************************************/ 00118000
*                                                                  0100 00119000
*         DCBLFMAT=INVFMNO;         /* INIT FOWM NO TO INV           */ 00120000
         MVI   DCBLFMAT(@14),X'FF'                                 0100 00121000
*         DCBEOPFG=OFF;             /* TURN OFF EOP FLAG             */ 00122000
         NI    DCBEOPFG(@14),B'01111111'                           0101 00123000
*         DCBFRTBA=RF;              /* ADDRESS OF TAB & FR AREA      */ 00124000
         ST    RF,DCBFRTBA(,@14)                                   0102 00125000
*         DCBMFCRL=BITON;           /* DEFAULT TO MACRF=RC FOR DCB   */ 00126000
         OI    DCBMFCRL+40(RDCB),B'00000010'                       0103 00127000
*/* SETUP SETDEV LIST FORM AND EXECUTE                               */ 00128000
*                                                                  0104 00129000
*         OPWASDEV=SETDEVL;         /* MOVE SETDEV LIST SHELL TO OPEN   00130000
*                                      WORK AREA                     */ 00131000
         MVC   OPWASDEV(12),SETDEVL                                0104 00132000
*         SDEVDCBA=RDCB;            /* INIT ADDR OF DCB IN     SETDEV*/ 00133000
         ST    RDCB,SDEVDCBA                                       0105 00134000
*         IF DCBFRID(ONE)=NOTSPFD1  /* FRID ON DCB                   */ 00135000
*           THEN                    /* NO,CHECK DD FOR FRID          */ 00136000
         CLI   DCBFRID(@14),X'00'                                  0106 00137000
         BNE   @RF00106                                            0106 00138000
*           IF JFCFCBID=NOTSPFD     /* FRID ON DD                    */ 00139000
*             THEN                  /* NO,SETUP INVALID LIST FORM    */ 00140000
         CLC   JFCFCBID(4),@CB01629                                0107 00141000
         BNE   @RF00107                                            0107 00142000
*             SDEVFRID=NOTSPFD;     /* WILL CAUSE WTP FROM     SETDEV*/ 00143000
         MVC   SDEVFRID(4),@CB01629                                0108 00144000
*           ELSE                    /* FRID ON DD CARD               */ 00145000
*             DO RF=ONE TO FOUR;    /* MOVE FRID FROM JFCB TO OWA    */ 00146000
         B     @RC00107                                            0109 00147000
@RF00107 LA    RF,1                                                0109 00148000
@DL00109 DS    0H                                                  0110 00149000
*               IF JFCFCBID(RF)=NULL/* THIS CHAR OF FRID X'00'       */ 00150000
*                 THEN              /* YES,CHANGE TO                 */ 00151000
         LA    @14,JFCFCBID-1(RF)                                  0110 00152000
         CLI   0(@14),X'00'                                        0110 00153000
         BNE   @RF00110                                            0110 00154000
*                 SDEVFRID(RF)=BLANK;/* BLANK                        */ 00155000
         LA    @14,SDEVFRID-1(RF)                                  0111 00156000
         MVI   0(@14),X'40'                                        0111 00157000
*               ELSE                /* NO,INSERT CHAR                */ 00158000
*                 SDEVFRID(RF)=JFCFCBID(RF);/* IN SETDEV LIST        */ 00159000
         B     @RC00110                                            0112 00160000
@RF00110 LA    @14,SDEVFRID-1(RF)                                  0112 00161000
         LA    @11,JFCFCBID-1(RF)                                  0112 00162000
         MVC   0(1,@14),0(@11)                                     0112 00163000
*             END;                  /* FRID MOVED FROM JFCB          */ 00164000
@RC00110 AH    RF,@CH00044                                         0113 00165000
         CH    RF,@CH00048                                         0113 00166000
         BNH   @DL00109                                            0113 00167000
*         ELSE                      /* YES, FRID ON DCB              */ 00168000
*           SDEVFRID=DCBFRID;       /* MOVE FRID FROM DCB TO LIST    */ 00169000
         B     @RC00106                                            0114 00170000
@RF00106 MVC   SDEVFRID(4),DCBFRID+4(RDCB)                         0114 00171000
*/* ISSUE SETDEV AND CHECK FOR ERRORS                                */ 00172000
*                                                                  0115 00173000
*         RF=ADDR(OPWASDEV);        /* LOAD REG 1 FOR SETDEV         */ 00174000
@RC00106 LA    RF,OPWASDEV                                         0115 00175000
*SETDEV:                            /* LOAD FR IN DEVICE             */ 00176000
*         GENERATE;                                                0116 00177000
*                                                                  0116 00178000
SETDEV   DS    0H                                                  0116 00179000
         SETDEV DEVT=3886,MF=(E,(1)) LOAD FIRST FORMAT RECORD           00180000
*/*                                                                  */ 00181000
*/*                                                           Y02870 */ 00182000
*/* THIS ROUTINE WILL MOVE THE DATA MANAGEMENT DCB USED BY THEY02870 */ 00183000
*/* OPEN EXECUTORS BACK INTO THE USER AREA                    Y02870 */ 00184000
*/*                                                           Y02870 */ 00185000
*                                                                  0117 00186000
*         TCBPTR=DEBTCBAD;          /* Y02870                        */ 00187000
         L     @14,DEBPTR                                          0117 00188000
         L     TCBPTR,DEBTCBAD(,@14)                               0117 00189000
*         DO;                       /* MODESET EXTKEY(DATAMGT)       */ 00190000
*           SPKA(80);               /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 00191000
         LA    @14,80                                              0119 00192000
         SPKA  0(@14)                                              0119 00193000
*         END;                      /* MODESET EXTKEY(DATAMGT) GET D.   00194000
*                                      M. KEY                @YM02506*/ 00195000
*/* NEXTIDTR - DETERMINES NEXT EXECUTOR TO GET CONTROL               */ 00196000
*/*             IGG0196M FOR ABEND CONDITIONS                        */ 00197000
*/*             IGG0191I FOR GETMAIN FOR BUFFERS                     */ 00198000
*/*             IGG0191G FOR ALL OTHER CONDITIONS                    */ 00199000
*/*                                                                  */ 00200000
*                                                                  0121 00201000
*         IF RJ¬=GOODCOMP           /* DID SETDEV EXECUTE OK         */ 00202000
*           THEN                    /* NO, SETUP FOR ABEND           */ 00203000
         LTR   RJ,RJ                                               0121 00204000
         BZ    @RF00121                                            0121 00205000
*           DO;                                                    0122 00206000
*             IF RJ=RETCOD1         /* RETURN CODE = X'04'           */ 00207000
*               THEN                /* YES,SETUP                     */ 00208000
         CH    RJ,@CH01634                                         0123 00209000
         BNE   @RF00123                                            0123 00210000
*               RE=NOTINLIB;        /* DMABCOND CODE OF 71           */ 00211000
         LA    RE,71                                               0124 00212000
*             ELSE                  /* NOT X'04'                     */ 00213000
*               DO;                 /* CHK OTHER RETURN CODES        */ 00214000
         B     @RC00123                                            0125 00215000
@RF00123 DS    0H                                                  0126 00216000
*                 IF RJ=RETCOD2     /* RETURN CODE = X'08'           */ 00217000
*                   THEN            /* YES,SETUP                     */ 00218000
         CH    RJ,@CH01636                                         0126 00219000
         BNE   @RF00126                                            0126 00220000
*                   RE=LIBERR;      /* DMABCOND CODE OF 95           */ 00221000
         LA    RE,95                                               0127 00222000
*                 ELSE              /* NOT X'08'                     */ 00223000
*                   DO;             /* CHECK OTHER RET CODES         */ 00224000
         B     @RC00126                                            0128 00225000
@RF00126 DS    0H                                                  0129 00226000
*                     IF RJ=RETCOD3 /* RETURN CODE = X'0C'           */ 00227000
*                       THEN        /* YES,SETUP                     */ 00228000
         CH    RJ,@CH01638                                         0129 00229000
         BNE   @RF00129                                            0129 00230000
*                       RE=IOERR;   /* DMABCOND CODE OF 69           */ 00231000
         LA    RE,69                                               0130 00232000
*                     ELSE          /* NO,MUST BE = X'10',SETUP      */ 00233000
*                       RE=NOFRID;  /* DMABCOND CODE OF 96           */ 00234000
         B     @RC00129                                            0131 00235000
@RF00129 LA    RE,96                                               0131 00236000
*                   END;            /* END DO LOOP                   */ 00237000
@RC00129 DS    0H                                                  0133 00238000
*               END;                /* END DO LOOP                   */ 00239000
@RC00126 DS    0H                                                  0134 00240000
*             GENERATE;                                            0134 00241000
@RC00123 DS    0H                                                  0134 00242000
         DMABCOND (0),PDLOAD,RETURN=NONE,RES=NO                         00243000
*             MODID=WTGID;          /* STORE ID IN WTG TABLE         */ 00244000
         MVC   MODID(2,RWTG),WTGID(RWTGC)                          0135 00245000
*             MODTTR=WTGTTR1;       /* PUT TTR IN WTG TABLE  @YM02506*/ 00246000
         MVC   MODTTR(3,RWTG),WTGTTR1(RWTGC)                       0136 00247000
*             RJ=ADDR(DXXCTL);      /* LOAD REG 15 FOR XCTL EFORM    */ 00248000
         LA    RJ,DXXCTL                                           0137 00249000
*             GENERATE;                                            0138 00250000
         XCTL  DE=(6),SF=(E,(15))                                       00251000
*           END;                                                   0139 00252000
*         ELSE                      /* SETDEV EXECUTED OK            */ 00253000
*           IF DCBBUFCA=NOADDR&     /* NEED TO GET BUFFER POOL       */ 00254000
*               DCBBUFNO¬=NOBUFS    /* FOR 3886                      */ 00255000
*             THEN                  /* YES,SETUP ID FOR BUFFR        */ 00256000
         B     @RC00121                                            0140 00257000
@RF00121 LA    @14,16                                              0140 00258000
         ALR   @14,RDCB                                            0140 00259000
         CLC   DCBBUFCA(3,@14),@CF00044+1                          0140 00260000
         BNE   @RF00140                                            0140 00261000
         CLI   DCBBUFNO(@14),0                                     0140 00262000

*             IDTTR=MODNM1I;        /* POOL GETMAIN                  */ 00264000
         MVC   IDTTR(5,RWTGC),MODNM1I                              0141 00265000
*           ELSE                    /* NO,SETUP ID FOR THE NEXT      */ 00266000
*             IDTTR=MODNM1G;        /* OPEN STAGE I TO CREATE IOB    */ 00267000
         B     @RC00140                                            0142 00268000
@RF00140 MVC   IDTTR(5,RWTGC),MODNM1G                              0142 00269000
*       END;                                                       0143 00270000
*     ELSE                                                         0144 00271000
*       ;                           /* NULL ELSE                     */ 00272000
@RF00076 DS    0H                                                  0145 00273000
*     DEBDCBB=DXUDCBAD;             /* PUT USER DCB INTO DEB @YM02506*/ 00274000
@RC00076 L     @14,DEBPTR                                          0145 00275000
         MVC   DEBDCBB(3,@14),DXUDCBAD+1                           0145 00276000
*     GEN(IECRES INIT,DCBCOPY=FRWKAR,STM=(0,14,WTGPREFX));         0146 00277000
         IECRES INIT,DCBCOPY=FRWKAR,STM=(0,14,WTGPREFX)                 00278000
*     RWTGC=RWTGC+LOFWTGEN;         /* INCR CURRENT W-T-G ENTRY      */ 00279000
         AH    RWTGC,@CH00051                                      0147 00280000
*     RPARC=RPARC+LOFPAREN;         /* INCR CURRENT PRM LST ENTRY    */ 00281000
         AH    RPARC,@CH00048                                      0148 00282000
*   END;                            /* ENDS INITIAL DO-WHILE       0149 00283000
*                                      INDICATES END OF W-T-G TAB    */ 00284000
@DE00075 CLC   WTGID(2,RWTGC),@CC01611                             0149 00285000
         BNE   @DL00075                                            0149 00286000
*   RPARC=RPAR;                     /* RESET CUR PARM ENTRY TO FRONT    00287000
*                                      OF OPEN PARM LIST             */ 00288000
         LR    RPARC,RPAR                                          0150 00289000
*   RWTGC=RWTG+LOFWTGHD;            /* RESET CUR WTG ENTRY PTR TO  0151 00290000
*                                      FRONT OF WTG ENTRIES          */ 00291000
         LA    RWTGC,32                                            0151 00292000

*   DO WHILE(WTGID1=NULL);          /* FIND A NON-COMPLETE WTG       */ 00294000
         B     @DE00152                                            0152 00295000
@DL00152 DS    0H                                                  0153 00296000
*     RWTGC=RWTGC+LOFWTGEN;         /* BUMP CUR WTG PTR              */ 00297000
         AH    RWTGC,@CH00051                                      0153 00298000

         AH    RPARC,@CH00048                                      0154 00300000
*   END;                            /* END WTG TABLE SEARCH          */ 00301000
@DE00152 CLI   WTGID1(RWTGC),X'00'                                 0155 00302000

*   MODID=WTGID;                    /* STORE ID IN WTG TABLE         */ 00304000
