./  ADD  SSI=72490034,NAME=IGG08108
         TITLE 'IGG08108 - SETDEV MODULE                               *00001000
                        '                                               00002000
IGG08108 CSECT ,                                                   0001 00003000
@PROLOG  BALR  @03,0                                               0001 00004000
@PSTART  DS    0H                                                  0001 00005000
         USING @PSTART,@03                                         0001 00006000
RBPRFXLN EQU 64                                                         00007000
RBPRFLNA EQU 32                                                         00008000
PRBLEN   EQU 136                                                        00009000
SIRBLEN  EQU 200                                                        00010000
TIRBLEN  EQU 136                                                        00011000
IRBLEN   EQU 128                                                        00012000
SVRBLEN  EQU 200                                                        00013000
*                                                                  0126 00014000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00015000
*   /*                                                               */ 00016000
*   /* ******** FREE UP XCTL WORK AREA FROM CALLING EXECUTOR OBTAIN  */ 00017000
*   /* WORKAREA FOR IGG08108 PARAMETER LIST INDICATES WORK AREA      */ 00018000
*   /* FACTOR                                                        */ 00019000
*   /*                                                               */ 00020000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 00021000
*                                                                  0127 00022000
*   DO;                             /* MODESET KEYADDR(CALLKEY)    0127 00023000
*                                      WORKREG(RWK2)                 */ 00024000
*     RWK2=CALLKEY;                 /* GET KEY FORM SAVE LOCATION    */ 00025000
         SLR   RWK2,RWK2                                           0128 00026000
         IC    RWK2,CALLKEY(,RWTG)                                 0128 00027000
*     SPKA(RWK2);                   /* SET PSW KEY                   */ 00028000
         SPKA  0(RWK2)                                             0129 00029000
*   END;                            /* MODESET KEYADDR(CALLKEY)    0130 00030000
*                                      WORKREG(RWK2) GET CALLER KEY     00031000
*                                                            @ZA24698*/ 00032000
*   REG0=WKARFACT*WKARCNST;         /* COMPUTE SIZE OF WORK AREA     */ 00033000
         SLR   REG0,REG0                                           0131 00034000
         IC    REG0,WKARFACT(,RPAR)                                0131 00035000
         SLA   REG0,7                                              0131 00036000
*   REG1=REG0;                      /* GET LENGTH OF CORE NEEDED   0132 00037000
*                                                            @YM02505*/ 00038000
         LR    REG1,REG0                                           0132 00039000
*   DCBPTR=DCBADDR;                 /* POINT TO DCB Y02870           */ 00040000
         L     DCBPTR,DCBADDR(,RPAR)                               0133 00041000
*   NAMEPTR=REG0;                   /* SAVE CORE SIZE FOR FREEMAIN 0134 00042000
*                                                            @YM02505*/ 00043000
         LR    NAMEPTR,REG0                                        0134 00044000
*/*THIS ROUTINE WILL GET CORE ACCORDINGLY                    @YM02505*/ 00045000
*/*      SUBPOOL 250 IF SETDEV WAS INVOKED BY THE USER       @YM02505*/ 00046000
*/*      SUBPOOL 230 IF SETDEV WAS INVOKED BY THE OPEN       @YM02505*/ 00047000
*                                                                  0135 00048000
*   IF DCBDEVT=D3886 THEN                                          0135 00049000
         CLI   DCBDEVT+16(DCBPTR),X'57'                            0135 00050000
         BNE   @RF00135                                            0135 00051000
*     RFRT=DCBFRTBA;                /* 3886 DEVICE           @YM02505   00052000
*                                                            @YM30699*/ 00053000
         L     RFRT,DCBFRTBA+4(,DCBPTR)                            0136 00054000
*   IF DCBDEVT=D3886&FRIDTAB=CONST000 THEN                         0137 00055000
@RF00135 CLI   DCBDEVT+16(DCBPTR),X'57'                            0137 00056000
         BNE   @RF00137                                            0137 00057000
         L     @14,FRIDTAB(,RFRT)                                  0137 00058000
         LTR   @14,@14                                             0137 00059000
         BNZ   @RF00137                                            0137 00060000
*     DO;                           /*                       @YM02505*/ 00061000
*       REG0=REG1+SUBPL230;         /* SET UP GETMAIN CONSTANT     0139 00062000
*                                                            @YM02505*/ 00063000
         LR    REG0,REG1                                           0139 00064000
         AL    REG0,@CF00191                                       0139 00065000
*       GEN(GETMAIN R,LV=(0));      /* GET CORE FROM SUBPOOL 230   0140 00066000
*                                                            @YM02505*/ 00067000
         GETMAIN R,LV=(0)                                               00068000
*       RCORE=REG1;                 /* PUT GETMAIN ADDR IN WORKAREA     00069000
*                                      REGISTER              @YM02505*/ 00070000
         LR    RCORE,REG1                                          0141 00071000
*       SUBPOLL=SUBPOLE6;           /* SET 230 FREEMAIN FLAG @YM02505*/ 00072000
         MVI   SUBPOLL(RCORE),X'E6'                                0142 00073000
*     END;                          /*                       @YM02505*/ 00074000
*   ELSE                                                           0144 00075000
*     DO;                           /* IF 3886 NOT OPEN GET CORE FROM   00076000
*                                      SUBPOOL 250           @YM02505*/ 00077000
         B     @RC00137                                            0144 00078000
@RF00137 DS    0H                                                  0145 00079000
*       REG0=REG1+SUBPL250;         /* SET UP GETMAIN CONSTANT     0145 00080000
*                                                            @YM02505*/ 00081000
         LR    REG0,REG1                                           0145 00082000
         AL    REG0,@CF00193                                       0145 00083000
*       GEN(GETMAIN R,LV=(0));      /* GET CORE FROM SUBPOOL 230   0146 00084000
*                                                            @YM02505*/ 00085000
         GETMAIN R,LV=(0)                                               00086000
*       RCORE=REG1;                 /* PUT GETMAIN ADDR IN WORKAREA     00087000
*                                      REGISTER              @YM02505*/ 00088000
         LR    RCORE,REG1                                          0147 00089000
*       SUBPOLL=SUBPOLFA;           /* SET 250 FREEMAIN FLAG @YM02505*/ 00090000
         MVI   SUBPOLL(RCORE),X'FA'                                0148 00091000
*     END;                          /*                       @YM02505*/ 00092000
*   CORESIZE=NAMEPTR;               /* PUT SIZE IN FREEMAIN CONSTANT    00093000
*                                                            @YM02505*/ 00094000
@RC00137 STCM  NAMEPTR,7,CORESIZE(RCORE)                           0150 00095000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0151 00096000
*    (RTNPTR) RSTD;                 /*                       @YM02505*/ 00097000
*   RTNPTR=CVTTCBP;                 /* GET TCB POINTER       @YM02505*/ 00098000
         L     @12,CVTPTR                                          0152 00099000
         L     RTNPTR,CVTTCBP(,@12)                                0152 00100000
*   TCBPTR=CURTCB;                  /* GET CURRENT TCB ADDRESS     0153 00101000
*                                                            @YM02505*/ 00102000
         L     TCBPTR,CURTCB+4(,RTNPTR)                            0153 00103000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0154 00104000
*    (RTNPTR) UNRSTD;               /*                       @YM02505*/ 00105000
*   DEBPTR=DCBDEBA;                 /* POINT TO DEB Y02870           */ 00106000
         L     @14,DCBDEBA+39(,DCBPTR)                             0155 00107000
         LA    @14,0(,@14)                                         0155 00108000
         ST    @14,DEBPTR(,RCORE)                                  0155 00109000
*   TCBPTR=DEBTCBAD;                /* GET USER TCB ADDRESS Y02870   */ 00110000
         L     @14,DEBPTR(,RCORE)                                  0156 00111000
         L     TCBPTR,DEBTCBAD(,@14)                               0156 00112000
*   RTNCODE=NOERROR;                /* INIT RETURN CODE TO 0         */ 00113000
         SLR   RTNCODE,RTNCODE                                     0157 00114000
*   NOMSGFLG=BOF;                   /* INIT FLAG TO OFF              */ 00115000
         MVI   NOMSGFLG(RCORE),X'00'                               0158 00116000
*   SAVERC=CONST000;                /* INIT RETURN CODE SAVEAREA     */ 00117000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             0159 00118000
         ST    @14,SAVERC(,RCORE)                                  0159 00119000
*   IF DCBPTR¬=CONST000 THEN        /* TEST FOR VALID DCB            */ 00120000
         LTR   DCBPTR,DCBPTR                                       0160 00121000
         BZ    @RF00160                                            0160 00122000
*     DO;                                                          0161 00123000
*       IF DCBDEVT=D3886 THEN       /* TEST FOR 3886 - LOAD FMT RD   */ 00124000
         CLI   DCBDEVT+16(DCBPTR),X'57'                            0162 00125000
         BNE   @RF00162                                            0162 00126000
*         DO;                                                      0163 00127000
*                                                                  0163 00128000
*/********************************************************************/ 00129000
*/*                                                                  */ 00130000
*/*  FUNCTION-THE 3886 SECTION OF SETDEV SEARCHES THE FORMAT         */ 00131000
*/*           RECORD TABLE FOR A DUPLICATE ENTRY OR AN AVAILABLE     */ 00132000
*/*           ENTRY. THE ID IS APPENDED TO 'FRLG' TO LOAD THE FORMAT */ 00133000
*/*           RECORD. THE FORMAT RECORD IS LOADED FROM SYS1.IMAGELIB */ 00134000
*/*           AND PASSED TO THE DEVICE. CONTROL IS THEN RETURNED TO  */ 00135000
*/*           THE USER.                                              */ 00136000
*/*                                                                  */ 00137000
*/*  SEGMENTS-DEVT3886,T3886PMS,FRTABMG,LOADFRID                     */ 00138000
*/*                                                                  */ 00139000
*/*  INPUT-SETDEV PARAMETER LIST,POINTER TO UCB                      */ 00140000
*/*                                                                  */ 00141000
*/*  OUTPUT-3886 CONTROL UNIT LOADED WITH FORMAT RECORD              */ 00142000
*/*         UPDATED FORMAT RECORD TABLE                              */ 00143000
*/*                                                                  */ 00144000
*/*  EXTERNAL REFERENCES-LOAD -INNER PROCEDURE TO THIS MODULE,LOADS  */ 00145000
*/*           THE FORMAT RECORD TO MAIN STORAGE FROM SYS1.IMAGELIB.  */ 00146000
*/*                      IORTN -INNER PROCEDURE TO THIS MODULE,LOADS */ 00147000
*/*           THE FORMAT RECORD TO THE 3886                          */ 00148000
*/*                      CLEANUP -INNER BACK TO CALLER               */ 00149000
*/*                                                                  */ 00150000
*/*  EXITS,NORMAL -RETURN TO CALLER WITH RETURN CODE X'00' IN REG 15 */ 00151000
*/*               -RETURN TO EOF ADDRESS IN CALLERS DCB FOR UNIT EXC */ 00152000
*/*                                                                  */ 00153000
*/*  EXITS,ERROR  - RETURN TO CALLER WITH RETURN CODE IN REG 15      */ 00154000
*/*                 X'04' MEMBER NOT FOUND IN SYS1.IMAGELIB          */ 00155000
*/*                 X'08' UNABLE TO LOAD MEMBER FROM SYS1.IMAGELIB   */ 00156000
*/*                 X'0C' PERMANENT I/O ERROR LOADING DEVICE         */ 00157000
*/*                 X'10' INVALID PARAMETER LIST                     */ 00158000
*/*                                                                  */ 00159000
*/*  TABLES/WORKAREAS-SETDEV PARAMETER LIST                          */ 00160000
*/*                   FORMAT RECORD TABLE                            */ 00161000
*/*                   WORK AREA FOR THIS MODULE                      */ 00162000
*/*                                                                  */ 00163000

*             DO;                                                  0178 00224000
*                                                                  0178 00225000
*               /*****************************************************/ 00226000
*               /*                                                   */ 00227000
*               /* ******** FORMAT RECORD TABLE MANAGEMENT ROUTINE   */ 00228000
*               /* (1) ADDRESS'S ARE FILLED IN THE TABLE BY OPEN. (2)*/ 00229000
*               /* FRID ARE FILLED IN BY THIS ROUTINE (3) THERE CAN  */ 00230000
*               /* BE A MAXIMUM OF 8 ENTRIES IN THE TABLE (4) IF THE */ 00231000
*               /* FRID SPECIFIED IN THE SETDEV IS ALREADY IN THE    */ 00232000
*               /* TABLE THE FR IS NOT LOAD FROM SYS1.IMAGELIB. (5)  */ 00233000
*               /* IF THE FRID IS NOT IN THE TABLE THEN THE FR IS    */ 00234000
*               /* LOADED FROM SYS1.IMAGELIB. (6) IF THE FR TABLE IS */ 00235000
*               /* FULL THE TOP FR ENTRY WILL BE REPLACED            */ 00236000
*               /*                                                   */ 00237000
*               /*****************************************************/ 00238000
*                                                                  0179 00239000
*FRTABMG:                           /* LABEL TO IDENTIFY TAB MG      */ 00240000
*               RFRL=CONST000;      /* INIT FMT RCD PTR TO ZERO      */ 00241000
FRTABMG  SLR   RFRL,RFRL                                           0179 00242000
*               DO X=ONE TO EIGHT WHILE RFRL=CONST000;/* LOOP THRU 0180 00243000
*                                      FMT RCD TABLE                 */ 00244000
*                                                                  0180 00245000
         LA    @14,1                                               0180 00246000
         ST    @14,X(,RCORE)                                       0180 00247000
@DL00180 LTR   RFRL,RFRL                                           0180 00248000
         BNZ   @DC00180                                            0180 00249000
*                 /***************************************************/ 00250000
*                 /*                                                 */ 00251000
*                 /* FIND THE NXT AVAILABLE ENTRY OR ENTRY TO BE USED*/ 00252000
*                 /*                                                 */ 00253000
*                 /***************************************************/ 00254000
*                                                                  0181 00255000
*                 IF FRIDTAB=CONST000 THEN/* TST FOR NXT AVAILABLE 0181 00256000
*                                      ENTRY                         */ 00257000

         LTR   @14,@14                                             0181 00259000
         BNZ   @RF00181                                            0181 00260000
*                   RFRL=FRADDR;    /* YES SET PTR TO USE THIS ENTRY */ 00261000

*                 ELSE                                             0183 00263000
*                   IF FRID=FRIDTAB THEN/* TST IF THIS ENTRY TO BE 0183 00264000
*                                      USED                          */ 00265000

@RF00181 CLC   FRID(4,RPAR),FRIDTAB(RFRT)                          0183 00267000
         BNE   @RF00183                                            0183 00268000
*                     RFRL=FRADDR;  /* SET PTR TO ENTRY TO BE USED   */ 00269000

*                   ELSE            /* ENTRY IN TABLE ALREADY TAKEN  */ 00271000
*                     IF X¬=EIGHT THEN/* TST IF END OF TABLE REACHED */ 00272000

@RF00183 CLC   X(4,RCORE),@CF00042                                 0185 00274000

*                       RFRT=RFRT+EIGHT;/* NO,INCR PTR TO NEXT TABLE    00276000
*                                      ENTRY                         */ 00277000

*                     ELSE          /* YES,END OF TABLE REACHED      */ 00279000
*                       DO;                                        0187 00280000
         B     @RC00185                                            0187 00281000
@RF00185 DS    0H                                                  0188 00282000
*                         RWK2=DCBFRTBA->FRADDR;/* SAVE ADDR FOR NXT    00283000

*                         FRTABLE(1:56)=FRTABSB;/* MOVE LAST 7     0189 00287000
*                                                            @ZA04490*/ 00288000

*                         FRTABLE(57:64)='';/* ENTRIES IN TBLE     0190 00292000
*                                                            @ZA04490   00293000
*                                      UP TO 1ST 7 POSITIONS @ZA04490*/ 00294000

*                         FRADDR=RWK2;/* RESTORE ADDR FOR FMT RCD    */ 00298000

*                         FRIDTAB=CONST000;/* ZERO OUT FRID FIELD    */ 00300000

*                         RFRL=FRADDR;/* SET PTR TO USE THIS ENTRY   */ 00303000

*               END;                                               0195 00306000

*               IF FRIDTAB=CONST000 THEN/* TST IF NEED TO LOAD FR    */ 00315000

*                 DO;                                              0197 00319000

*                   NAMEPTR=ADDR(MODNAME);/* SET PTR TO MEMBER TO LD */ 00324000

*                         SPKA(REG1);/* SET PSW KEY                  */ 00354000

*                                      WORKREG(REG1)         @ZA24698*/ 00357000
*                       RFY                                        0215 00358000

*                       /*********************************************/ 00372000
*                       /*                                           */ 00373000
*                       /* DELETE FORMAT RECORD JUST LOADED          */ 00374000
*                       /*                                           */ 00375000
*                       /*********************************************/ 00376000
*                                                                  0220 00377000

*                     END;                                         0224 00386000
*                 END;                                             0225 00387000

*                                                                  0226 00389000
*               /*****************************************************/ 00390000
*               /*                                                   */ 00391000
*               /* ******** SEQUENCE TO LOAD THE FORMAT RECORD INTO  */ 00392000
*               /* THE 3886 (1) BUILD IOB IN WORKAREA (2) BUILD LOAD */ 00393000
*               /* FORMAT CCW IN WORKAREA (3) ISSUE COMMAND          */ 00394000

*                                                                  0226 00397000
*LOADFRID:                          /* LABEL FOR LOADFRID     SEGMENT*/ 00398000

*                 DO;                                              0227 00403000
*                   IOBSTPTR=ADDR(IOBBODY);                        0228 00404000

*                   IOBBODY=IOBBODY&&IOBBODY;/* ZERO OUT IOB BODY    */ 00406000

*                   IOBSTART=IOBSTPTR+IOBLENGT;/* SET PTR TO LOAD CCW*/ 00414000

*                   IOBDCBPT=DEBDCBB;/* SET PTR TO USER'S DCB      0233 00418000
*                                                            @ZA04496*/ 00419000

*                   CCWDADR=ADDR(FRIMAG);/* SET DATA ADDR IN CCW     */ 00424000

*                   CCWOPCD=LDFMATR;/* SET CCW OP CODE TO LOAD FR    */ 00427000

*                   CCW2=NOOPCCW;   /* MOVE NOOP CCW INTO CHAIN      */ 00434000

*                   CALL IORTN;     /* CALL I/O RTN TO LOAD FR       */ 00436000
