*           RESPECIFY                                              0274 00533000
*             RFRL UNRSTD;                                         0274 00534000
@RF00269 DS    0H                                                  0275 00535000
*         END;                                                     0275 00536000
*       ELSE                                                       0276 00537000
*         IF DCBDEVT=D3890 THEN     /* TST FOR 3890- INIT 3890       */ 00538000
         B     @RC00162                                            0276 00539000
@RF00162 CLI   DCBDEVT+16(DCBPTR),X'56'                            0276 00540000
         BNE   @RF00276                                            0276 00541000
*           DO;                                                    0277 00542000
*                                                                  0277 00543000
*/* START OF SPECIFICATIONS ******************************************/ 00544000
*/*                                                                  */ 00545000
*/*    ROUTINE NAME = DEVT3890, DEVICE TYPE 3890                     */ 00546000
*/*                                                                  */ 00547000
*/*    FUNCTION = 1. VERIFY SETDEV PARAMETERS AND DCB.DETECT AND     */ 00548000
*/*                  HANDLE ERROR CONDITIONS.                        */ 00549000
*/*               2. MOVE IMAGE DATA TO WRITE BUFFER                 */ 00550000
*/*               3. LOAD INITIALIZATION RECORD                      */ 00551000
*/*               4. LOAD SCI PROGRAM INTO 3890                      */ 00552000
*/*               5. LOAD SCI SUBROUTINE INTO 3890                   */ 00553000
*/*               6. PRIME INPUT BUFFER                              */ 00554000
*/*                                                                  */ 00555000
*/*    INPUT = INPUT CONSISTS OF THE FOLLOWING:                      */ 00556000
*/*        REGISTERS                                                 */ 00557000
*/*            R4  - WORKAREA ADDRESS                                */ 00558000
*/*            R5  - SETDEV PARAMETER LIST ADDRESS                   */ 00559000
*/*            R13 - DCB ADDRESS                                     */ 00560000
*/*        TABLES/CONTROL BLOCKS                                     */ 00561000
*/*            SETDEV PARAMETER LIST-CREATED BY SETDEV MACRO AND     */ 00562000
*/*                LOAD 3890                                         */ 00563000
*/*            DCB-USED TO INSURE 3890 READY TO LOAD AND ALSO TO     */ 00564000
*/*                OBTAIN IOB ADDRESS.                               */ 00565000
*/*            IOB-USED AND MODIFIED TO START I/O TO LOAD 3890       */ 00566000
*/*                UCB AND DEB-USED TO INSURE 3890 READY FOR LOAD    */ 00567000
*/*                                                                  */ 00568000
*/*    OUTPUT = OUTPUT CONSISTS OF THE FOLLOWING:                    */ 00569000
*/*         FUNCTIONS PERFORMED                                      */ 00570000
*/*             3890 CONTROL UNIT LOADED                             */ 00571000
*/*             3890 INPUT BUFFER PRIMED                             */ 00572000
*/*         REGISTER 15                                              */ 00573000
*/*             00-SUCCESSFUL COMPLETION                             */ 00574000
*/*             04-MEMBER NOT FOUND IN SYS1.IMAGELIB                 */ 00575000
*/*             08-UNABLE TO LOAD MEMBER FROM SYS1.IMAGELIB          */ 00576000
*/*             0C-I/O ERROR DURING LOAD TO 3890                     */ 00577000
*/*             10-INVALID SETDEV PARMLIST,IREC OR DCB               */ 00578000
*/*             14-UNIT CHECK (IRV,RUNNING,NOT INITIALIZED)          */ 00579000
*/*                CONDITION OCCURRED DURING LOAD OF 3890            */ 00580000
*/*             18-SCI PROGRAM DOES NOT BEGIN WITH ENTR MACRO        */ 00581000
*/*    EXITS = UPON COMPLETION OF THE 3890 FUNCTIONS,A POSSIBLE 3890 */ 00582000
*/*            ERROR MESSAGE IS MOVED INTO THE WORKAREA TO PREPARE   */ 00583000
*/*            FOR THE CLEAN UP ROUTINE.CONTROL IS THEN PASSED TO    */ 00584000
*/*            THE STATEMENT LABELED CLEANUP.                        */ 00585000
*/*                                                                  */ 00586000
*/*    EXTERNAL REFERENCES = NONE                                    */ 00587000
*/*                                                                  */ 00588000
*/*    NOTES = FOR MORE INFORMATION ON THE 3890 SUPPORT LOGIC        */ 00589000
*/*            SEE PLM SY24-5163                                     */ 00590000
*/*                                                                  */ 00591000
*/* END OF SPECIFICATIONS FOR THE 3890 *******************************/ 00592000
*                                                                  0278 00593000
*DEVT3890:                                                         0278 00594000
*             IMGPROC=OFF;          /* INIT IMAGE PROC FLAG  @ZA04468*/ 00595000
DEVT3890 NI    IMGPROC(DCBPTR),B'11111110'                         0278 00596000
*             RFY                                                  0279 00597000
*               UCBPTR RSTD;        /*                       @ZA24702*/ 00598000
*             UCBPTR=DEBSUCBA;      /* GET UCB PTR           @ZA24702*/ 00599000
         L     @14,DEBPTR(,RCORE)                                  0280 00600000
         L     UCBPTR,DEBSUCBA(,@14)                               0280 00601000
*             RFY                                                  0281 00602000
*               UCBPTR UNRSTD;      /*                       @ZA24702*/ 00603000
*             IF UCBNOTRD='0'B THEN /* IF UCB POSTED READY THEN...   */ 00604000
         TM    UCBNOTRD(UCBPTR),B'01000000'                        0282 00605000
         BNZ   @RF00282                                            0282 00606000
*               DO;                 /* DO THE FOLLOWING...           */ 00607000
*                 HEADER=''B;       /* INITIALIZE USER HEADER AREA   */ 00608000
         L     @14,DCBHDR(,DCBPTR)                                 0284 00609000
         XC    HEADER(12,@14),HEADER(@14)                          0284 00610000
*                 IF DCBLRECL-HDRLEN=RECLEN&/* IF LRECL=RECORD LEN IN   00611000
*                                      IREC...                       */ 00612000
*                     IRECADDR¬=CONST000&/* AND IREC ADDRESS PRESENT */ 00613000
*                     DCBOFOPN='1'B&/* AND USER DCB OPENED           */ 00614000
*                     DCBIFLGS¬=PERMERR THEN/* AND NO PERMANENT ERROR   00615000
*                                      POSTED                        */ 00616000
         LH    @14,DCBLRECL+72(,DCBPTR)                            0285 00617000
         SL    @14,@CF00158                                        0285 00618000
         L     @12,IRECADDR(,RPAR)                                 0285 00619000
         CH    @14,RECLEN+128(,@12)                                0285 00620000
         BNE   @RF00285                                            0285 00621000
         L     @14,IRECADDR(,RPAR)                                 0285 00622000
         LTR   @14,@14                                             0285 00623000
         BZ    @RF00285                                            0285 00624000
         TM    DCBOFOPN+40(DCBPTR),B'00010000'                     0285 00625000
         BNO   @RF00285                                            0285 00626000
         CLI   DCBIFLGS+40(DCBPTR),B'11000000'                     0285 00627000
         BE    @RF00285                                            0285 00628000
*                   IF SRTNADDR=NOPARM|/* IF SUBRTN                0286 00629000
*                                      SPECIFIED,INSURE...           */ 00630000
*                       SCI¬=NOPARM THEN/* SCI PROGRAM SPECIFIED     */ 00631000
         L     @14,SRTNADDR(,RPAR)                                 0286 00632000
         LTR   @14,@14                                             0286 00633000
         BZ    @RT00286                                            0286 00634000
         L     @14,SCI(,RPAR)                                      0286 00635000
         LTR   @14,@14                                             0286 00636000
         BZ    @RF00286                                            0286 00637000
@RT00286 DS    0H                                                  0287 00638000
*                     DO;           /* THEN DO THE FOLLOWING...      */ 00639000
*                       IOBSTPTR=DCBIOBA+IOBPFXLN;/* SET POINTER TO     00640000
*                                      IOB                           */ 00641000
         L     @14,DCBIOBA+52(,DCBPTR)                             0288 00642000
         LA    @14,8(,@14)                                         0288 00643000
         LR    IOBSTPTR,@14                                        0288 00644000
*SETLMODE:                                                         0289 00645000
*                       IOBSTART=IOBSTPTR+LDOFF;/* PTR TO LOAD CCW 0289 00646000
*                                      AREA                          */ 00647000
SETLMODE LA    @14,32                                              0289 00648000
         ALR   @14,IOBSTPTR                                        0289 00649000
         ST    @14,IOBSTART(,IOBSTPTR)                             0289 00650000
*                       IOBFLAG1=UNRELATD;/* SET I/O REQUEST       0290 00651000
*                                      UNRELATED FLAG                */ 00652000
         MVI   IOBFLAG1(IOBSTPTR),X'02'                            0290 00653000
*                       CCWPTR=IOBSTART;/* SET PTR TO IOB CCW AREA   */ 00654000
         L     CCWPTR,IOBSTART(,IOBSTPTR)                          0291 00655000
*                       IOBCCWS=SETLMCCW;/* MOVE IN SET LOAD MODE  0292 00656000
*                                      CCWCHAIN                      */ 00657000
         MVC   IOBCCWS(16,CCWPTR),SETLMCCW                         0292 00658000
*/*************************                                          */ 00659000
*/* LOAD IREC INTO 3890 CU                                           */ 00660000
*/*************************                                          */ 00661000
*                                                                  0293 00662000
*IRECLOAD:                          /* LOAD IREC INTO 3890 CNTRL UNIT*/ 00663000
*                       CALL IORTN; /* START UP SET LOAD MODE CCW    */ 00664000
IRECLOAD BAL   @14,IORTN                                           0293 00665000
*                       IF RTNCODE=NOERROR THEN/* IF NO I/O ERROR  0294 00666000
*                                      OCCURED THEN..                */ 00667000
         LTR   RTNCODE,RTNCODE                                     0294 00668000
         BNZ   @RF00294                                            0294 00669000
*                         DO;       /* DO THE FOLLOWING...           */ 00670000
*                           IF IOBS0B1='0'B&/* TEST FOR INTERVENTION    00671000
*                                      REQUIRED                      */ 00672000
*                               IOBS0B7='0'B THEN/* TEST FOR DEVICE     00673000
*                                      RUNNING                       */ 00674000
         TM    IOBS0B1(IOBSTPTR),B'01000001'                       0296 00675000
         BNZ   @RF00296                                            0296 00676000
*                             DO;   /* IF NEITHER IRV OR RUN,THEN    */ 00677000
*                               IOBCCW1=LOADCCW;/* MOVE LOAD CCW INTO   00678000
*                                      IOB CCW AREA                  */ 00679000
         MVC   IOBCCW1(8,CCWPTR),LOADCCW                           0298 00680000
*                               CCWADDR=IRECADDR;/* SET ADDRESS OF 0299 00681000
*                                      IREC RECORD                   */ 00682000
         MVC   CCWADDR(3,CCWPTR),IRECADDR+1(RPAR)                  0299 00683000
*                               CALL IORTN;/* WRITE IREC RECORD OUT     00684000
*                                      TO 3890                       */ 00685000
         BAL   @14,IORTN                                           0300 00686000
*                             END;                                 0301 00687000
*                           ELSE    /* IF IRV OR RUN. SENSE,THEN DO  */ 00688000
*                             DO;                                  0302 00689000
         B     @RC00296                                            0302 00690000
@RF00296 DS    0H                                                  0303 00691000
*                               IF IOBS0B1='1'B THEN/* TEST FOR    0303 00692000
*                                      INTERVENTION REQUIRED         */ 00693000
         TM    IOBS0B1(IOBSTPTR),B'01000000'                       0303 00694000
         BNO   @RF00303                                            0303 00695000
*                                 NOMSGFLG=ON;/* INDICATE NO MESSAGE    00696000
*                                      WANTED                        */ 00697000
         MVI   NOMSGFLG(RCORE),X'01'                               0304 00698000
*                               HDRSENSE=IOBSNSE;/* PUT SENSE IN D.M.   00699000
*                                      HEADER                        */ 00700000
@RF00303 L     @14,DCBHDR(,DCBPTR)                                 0305 00701000
         MVC   HDRSENSE(2,@14),IOBSNSE+2(IOBSTPTR)                 0305 00702000
*                               IOBSNSE=CONST000;/* ZERO SENSE BYTES */ 00703000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             0306 00704000
         STH   @14,IOBSNSE+2(,IOBSTPTR)                            0306 00705000
*                               HDRTYPE=UC;/* INDICATE UNIT CHECK  0307 00706000
*                                      TYPE HDR                      */ 00707000
         L     @14,DCBHDR(,DCBPTR)                                 0307 00708000
         MVI   HDRTYPE(@14),X'02'                                  0307 00709000
*                               RTNCODE=UCERR;/* SET UNIT CHECK ERROR   00710000
*                                      CODE                          */ 00711000
         LA    RTNCODE,20                                          0308 00712000
*                             END;                                 0309 00713000
*                         END;                                     0310 00714000
@RC00296 DS    0H                                                  0311 00715000
*                       IF SCI¬=NOPARM&/* IF SCI PARAMETER PRESENT 0311 00716000
*                                      AND                           */ 00717000
*                           RTNCODE=NOERROR THEN/* NO ERRORS HAVE  0311 00718000
*                                      OCCURED,...                   */ 00719000
@RF00294 L     @14,SCI(,RPAR)                                      0311 00720000
         LTR   @14,@14                                             0311 00721000
         BZ    @RF00311                                            0311 00722000
         LTR   RTNCODE,RTNCODE                                     0311 00723000
         BNZ   @RF00311                                            0311 00724000
*/****************************                                       */ 00725000
*/* LOAD SCI PGM INTO 3890 CU                                        */ 00726000
*/****************************                                       */ 00727000
*                                                                  0312 00728000
*SCILOAD:                           /* LOAD SCI PGM IN CONTROL UNIT  */ 00729000
*                         DO;                                      0312 00730000
SCILOAD  DS    0H                                                  0313 00731000
*                           NAMEPTR=ADDR(SCINAME);/* SET POINTER TO     00732000
*                                      SCI PGM NAME                  */ 00733000
         LA    NAMEPTR,SCINAME(,RPAR)                              0313 00734000
*                           CALL LOAD;/* LOAD SCI PGM FROM         0314 00735000
*                                      SYS1.IMAGELIB                 */ 00736000
         BAL   @14,LOAD                                            0314 00737000
*                           IF RTNCODE=NOERROR THEN/* IF LOAD      0315 00738000
*                                      COMPLETED SUCCESSFULLY        */ 00739000
         LTR   RTNCODE,RTNCODE                                     0315 00740000
         BNZ   @RF00315                                            0315 00741000
*                             DO;   /* THEN DO THE FOLLOWING...      */ 00742000
*                               IF PGMNAME=ENTRMACR THEN/* IF A VALID   00743000
*                                      SCI PROGRAM THEN              */ 00744000
         CLC   PGMNAME(8,LDMODPTR),ENTRMACR                        0317 00745000
         BNE   @RF00317                                            0317 00746000
*                                 DO;/* DO THE FOLLOWING             */ 00747000
*                                   COUNT=BLDMODLN;/* SET LOAD     0319 00748000
*                                      COUNT=MODULE LENGTH           */ 00749000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             0319 00750000
         ICM   @14,7,BLDMODLN(RCORE)                               0319 00751000
         ST    @14,COUNT(,RCORE)                                   0319 00752000
*                                   DATAPTR=LDMODPTR;/* SET PTR TO 0320 00753000
*                                      SCI PROGRAM                   */ 00754000
         LR    DATAPTR,LDMODPTR                                    0320 00755000
*                                   CALL LOAD3890;/* WRITE OUT SCI 0321 00756000
*                                      PGM TO CNTRL UNIT             */ 00757000
         BAL   @14,LOAD3890                                        0321 00758000
*                                   GEN                            0322 00759000
*(DELETE EPLOC=(NAMEPTR) DELETE MODULE FROM CORE);                 0322 00760000
         DELETE EPLOC=(NAMEPTR) DELETE MODULE FROM CORE                 00761000
*                                 END;                             0323 00762000
*                               ELSE/* IF SCI PGM IS INVALID THEN... */ 00763000
*                                 RTNCODE=SCIERR;/* SET SCI PGM ERROR   00764000
*                                      CODE                          */ 00765000
         B     @RC00317                                            0324 00766000
@RF00317 LA    RTNCODE,24                                          0324 00767000
*                             END;                                 0325 00768000
@RC00317 DS    0H                                                  0326 00769000
*                         END;                                     0326 00770000
@RF00315 DS    0H                                                  0327 00771000
*                       IF SRTNADDR¬=NOPARM&/* IF SUBRTN PARM PRESENT   00772000
*                                      AND...                        */ 00773000
*                           RTNCODE=NOERROR THEN/* NO ERRORS OCCURED    00774000
*                                      THEN...                       */ 00775000
@RF00311 L     @14,SRTNADDR(,RPAR)                                 0327 00776000
         LTR   @14,@14                                             0327 00777000
         BZ    @RF00327                                            0327 00778000
         LTR   RTNCODE,RTNCODE                                     0327 00779000
         BNZ   @RF00327                                            0327 00780000
*/*************************************                              */ 00781000
*/* LOAD SCI SUBROUTINE INTO 3890 C.U.                               */ 00782000
*/*************************************                              */ 00783000
*                                                                  0328 00784000
*SRTNLOAD:                                                         0328 00785000
*                         DO;                                      0328 00786000
SRTNLOAD DS    0H                                                  0329 00787000
*                           IF SRTNRES='1'B THEN/* IF SUBRTN IS CORE    00788000
*                                      RESIDENT...                   */ 00789000
         TM    SRTNRES(RPAR),B'10000000'                           0329 00790000
         BNO   @RF00329                                            0329 00791000
*                             DO;   /* THEN DO THE FOLLOWING...      */ 00792000
*                               COUNT=SRTNLEN;/* GET LENGTH OF SUBRTN*/ 00793000
         L     @14,SRTNLEN(,RPAR)                                  0331 00794000
         ST    @14,COUNT(,RCORE)                                   0331 00795000
*                               DATAPTR=SRTNADDR;/* SET PTR TO SUBRTN   00796000
*                                      ADDRESS                       */ 00797000
         L     DATAPTR,SRTNADDR(,RPAR)                             0332 00798000
*                               CALL LOAD3890;/* WRITE SUBRTN TO 3890   00799000
*                                      C.U.                          */ 00800000
         BAL   @14,LOAD3890                                        0333 00801000
*                             END;                                 0334 00802000
*                           ELSE    /* IF SUBRTN NOT CORE RESIDENT...*/ 00803000
*                             DO;   /* THEN DO THE FOLLOWING...      */ 00804000
         B     @RC00329                                            0335 00805000
@RF00329 DS    0H                                                  0336 00806000
*                               NAMEPTR=ADDR(SRTNAME);/* SET PTR TO     00807000
*                                      SUBRTN NAME                   */ 00808000
         LA    NAMEPTR,SRTNAME(,RPAR)                              0336 00809000
*                               CALL LOAD;/* LOAD SUBRTN FROM      0337 00810000
*                                      IMAGELIB                      */ 00811000
         BAL   @14,LOAD                                            0337 00812000
*                               IF RTNCODE=NOERROR THEN/* IF MODULE     00813000
*                                      LOADED WITHOUT ERROR          */ 00814000
         LTR   RTNCODE,RTNCODE                                     0338 00815000
         BNZ   @RF00338                                            0338 00816000
*                                 DO;                              0339 00817000
*                                   COUNT=BLDMODLN;/* GET LENGTH OF     00818000
*                                      LOADED MODULE                 */ 00819000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             0340 00820000
         ICM   @14,7,BLDMODLN(RCORE)                               0340 00821000
         ST    @14,COUNT(,RCORE)                                   0340 00822000
*                                   DATAPTR=LDMODPTR;/* SET PTR TO 0341 00823000
*                                      SUBRTN                        */ 00824000
         LR    DATAPTR,LDMODPTR                                    0341 00825000
*                                   CALL LOAD3890;/* WRITE SCI SUBRTN   00826000
*                                      TO 3890 C.U.                  */ 00827000
         BAL   @14,LOAD3890                                        0342 00828000
*                                   GEN                            0343 00829000
*(DELETE EPLOC=(NAMEPTR) DELETE MODULE FROM CORE);                 0343 00830000
         DELETE EPLOC=(NAMEPTR) DELETE MODULE FROM CORE                 00831000
*                                 END;                             0344 00832000
*                             END;                                 0345 00833000
@RF00338 DS    0H                                                  0346 00834000
*                         END;                                     0346 00835000
@RC00329 DS    0H                                                  0347 00836000
*                       IF RTNCODE=NOERROR THEN/* IF NO ERRORS     0347 00837000
*                                      OCCURRED ...                  */ 00838000
@RF00327 LTR   RTNCODE,RTNCODE                                     0347 00839000
         BNZ   @RF00347                                            0347 00840000
*                         DO;       /* THEN DO THE FOLLOWING...      */ 00841000
*ENDLMODE:                                                         0349 00842000
*                           IOBCCW1=ENDLMCCW;/* MOVE END LOAD MODE 0349 00843000
*                                      CCW TO IOB                    */ 00844000
ENDLMODE MVC   IOBCCW1(8,CCWPTR),ENDLMCCW                          0349 00845000
*                           CALL IORTN;/* ISSUE EXCP TO END LOAD MODE*/ 00846000
         BAL   @14,IORTN                                           0350 00847000
*INITCHK:                                                          0351 00848000
*                           IF IOBS0B6='1'B THEN/* IF DEVICE IS NOT     00849000
*                                      INITIALIZED...                */ 00850000
INITCHK  TM    IOBS0B6(IOBSTPTR),B'00000010'                       0351 00851000
         BNO   @RF00351                                            0351 00852000
*                             DO;   /* THEN DO THE FOLLOWING...      */ 00853000
*                               HDRSENSE=IOBSNSE;/* PUT SENSE IN D.M.   00854000
*                                      HEADER                        */ 00855000
         L     @14,DCBHDR(,DCBPTR)                                 0353 00856000
         MVC   HDRSENSE(2,@14),IOBSNSE+2(IOBSTPTR)                 0353 00857000
*                               IOBSNSE=CONST000;/* ZERO SENSE BYTES */ 00858000
         SLR   @14,@14                                             0354 00859000
         STH   @14,IOBSNSE+2(,IOBSTPTR)                            0354 00860000
*                               HDRTYPE=UC;/* INDICATE UNIT CHECK  0355 00861000
*                                      TYPE HDR                      */ 00862000
         L     @14,DCBHDR(,DCBPTR)                                 0355 00863000
         MVI   HDRTYPE(@14),X'02'                                  0355 00864000
*                               RTNCODE=UCERR;/* SET UNIT CHECK ERROR   00865000
*                                      CODE                          */ 00866000
         LA    RTNCODE,20                                          0356 00867000
*                             END;                                 0357 00868000
*                         END;                                     0358 00869000
@RF00351 DS    0H                                                  0359 00870000
*                       IOBSTART=IOBSTPTR+RDOFF;/* SET PTR TO 3890 0359 00871000
*                                      CCWCHAIN                      */ 00872000
@RF00347 LA    @14,48                                              0359 00873000
         ALR   @14,IOBSTPTR                                        0359 00874000
         ST    @14,IOBSTART(,IOBSTPTR)                             0359 00875000
*                       IOBCMDCH='1'B;/* RESTORE CMD CHNING FLG    0360 00876000
*                                                            @ZA24702*/ 00877000
         OI    IOBCMDCH(IOBSTPTR),B'01000000'                      0360 00878000
*                       IF RTNCODE=NOERROR THEN/* IF NO ERRORS     0361 00879000
*                                      OCCURRED ...                  */ 00880000
         LTR   RTNCODE,RTNCODE                                     0361 00881000
         BNZ   @RF00361                                            0361 00882000
*PRIMEBUF:                                                         0362 00883000
*                         DO;       /* DO THE FOLLOWING...           */ 00884000
PRIMEBUF DS    0H                                                  0363 00885000
*                           CMDCODE=ANTICPTE;/* SET ANTICIPATE     0363 00886000
*                                      CCOMMAND CODE                 */ 00887000
         L     @14,IOBSTART(,IOBSTPTR)                             0363 00888000
         MVI   CMDCODE(@14),X'23'                                  0363 00889000
*                           IF PBF='1'B THEN/* PRIME IMAGE BUFFER    */ 00890000
         L     @14,IRECADDR(,RPAR)                                 0364 00891000
         TM    PBF(@14),B'00000010'                                0364 00892000
         BNO   @RF00364                                            0364 00893000
*                             DO;                                  0365 00894000
*                               IMGPROC=ONBIT;/* IND IMAGE PROC    0366 00895000
*                                      ACTIVE                @ZA04468*/ 00896000
         OI    IMGPROC(DCBPTR),B'00000001'                         0366 00897000
*                               EXTPTR=DCBIMG;/* GET IMAGE ROUTINE 0367 00898000
*                                      ADDRESS                       */ 00899000
         L     EXTPTR,DCBIMG(,DCBPTR)                              0367 00900000
*                               RESPECIFY                          0368 00901000
*                                (RTNPTR,                          0368 00902000
*                                 SVRB) RSTD;                      0368 00903000
*                               RTNPTR=CVTTCBP;/* GET CURRENT TCB PTR*/ 00904000
         L     @12,CVTPTR                                          0369 00905000
         L     RTNPTR,CVTTCBP(,@12)                                0369 00906000
*                               TCBPTR=CURTCB;/* GET CURRENT TCB   0370 00907000
*                                      ADDRESS                       */ 00908000
         L     TCBPTR,CURTCB+4(,RTNPTR)                            0370 00909000
*                               SVRB=TCBRBP;/* GET SVRB ADDRESS      */ 00910000
         L     SVRB,TCBRBP(,TCBPTR)                                0371 00911000
*                               DO; /* MODESET EXTKEY(SUPR)          */ 00912000
*                                 SPKA(0);/* SET PSW KEY             */ 00913000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0373 00914000
         SPKA  0(@12)                                              0373 00915000
*                               END;/* MODESET EXTKEY(SUPR)  @ZA24698*/ 00916000
*                               GEN(STM RWK2,DCBPTR,RBEXSAVE(SVRB));    00917000
         STM RWK2,DCBPTR,RBEXSAVE(SVRB)                                 00918000
*                                   /* SAVE REGS             @ZA24698*/ 00919000
*                               DO; /* MODESET KEYADDR(CALLKEY)    0376 00920000
*                                      WORKREG(RWK2)                 */ 00921000
*                                 RWK2=CALLKEY;/* GET KEY FORM SAVE     00922000
*                                      LOCATION                      */ 00923000
         SLR   RWK2,RWK2                                           0377 00924000
         IC    RWK2,CALLKEY(,RWTG)                                 0377 00925000
*                                 SPKA(RWK2);/* SET PSW KEY          */ 00926000
         SPKA  0(RWK2)                                             0378 00927000
*                               END;/* MODESET KEYADDR(CALLKEY)    0379 00928000
*                                      WORKREG(RWK2)         @ZA24698*/ 00929000
*                               GEN CODE;                          0380 00930000
*                                                          /*@ZA24698*/ 00931000
         LR    REG0,DCBPTR         LOAD DCB ADDRESS                     00932000
         LM    RWK2,DCBPTR,RBGRS2(SVRB) RESTORE USER REGS 2-13          00933000
         SYNCH (15)                GO TO USER IMAGE RTN                 00934000
*                               RTNPTR=CVTTCBP;/* GET ADDR OF TCB  0381 00935000
*                                      POINTERS                      */ 00936000
         L     @12,CVTPTR                                          0381 00937000
         L     RTNPTR,CVTTCBP(,@12)                                0381 00938000
*                               TCBPTR=CURTCB;/* GET CURRENT TCB ADDR*/ 00939000
         L     TCBPTR,CURTCB+4(,RTNPTR)                            0382 00940000
*                               SVRB=TCBRBP;/* GET SVRB ADDR         */ 00941000
         L     SVRB,TCBRBP(,TCBPTR)                                0383 00942000
*                               RESPECIFY                          0384 00943000
*                                (RTNPTR,                          0384 00944000
*                                 SVRB) UNRSTD;                    0384 00945000
*                               GEN                                0385 00946000
*(LM RWK2,DCBPTR,RBEXSAVE(SVRB) RESTORE SETDEV REGS);              0385 00947000
         LM RWK2,DCBPTR,RBEXSAVE(SVRB) RESTORE SETDEV REGS              00948000
*                               RTNCODE=CONST000;/* ZERO RETURN CODE */ 00949000
         SLR   RTNCODE,RTNCODE                                     0386 00950000
*IMGMOVE:                                                          0387 00951000
*                               IMGBUFFR=REG0;/* GET ADDRESS OF IMAGE   00952000
*                                      DATA                          */ 00953000
IMGMOVE  LR    IMGBUFFR,REG0                                       0387 00954000
*                               WRBUFFR=IOBSTPTR+CCWSLEN;/* SET    0388 00955000
*                                      POINTER TO WRITE BUFFER       */ 00956000
         LA    WRBUFFR,184                                         0388 00957000
         ALR   WRBUFFR,IOBSTPTR                                    0388 00958000
*                               BYTECNT=DCBBLKSI;/* SET LENGTH OF  0389 00959000
*                                      IMAGE DATA                    */ 00960000
         LH    BYTECNT,DCBBLKSI+52(,DCBPTR)                        0389 00961000
*                               RESPECIFY                          0390 00962000
*                                 IMGLEN RSTD;                     0390 00963000
*                               IMGLEN=BYTECNT;/* SET LENGTH OF IMAGE   00964000
*                                      DATA                          */ 00965000
         LR    IMGLEN,BYTECNT                                      0391 00966000
*                               RESPECIFY                          0392 00967000
*                                 IMGLEN UNRSTD;                   0392 00968000
*                               RESPECIFY                          0393 00969000
*                                 WRBUFFR UNRSTD;                  0393 00970000
*                               GEN                                0394 00971000
*(MVCL 8,10 PUT IMAGES IN WRITE BUFFER);                           0394 00972000
         MVCL 8,10 PUT IMAGES IN WRITE BUFFER                           00973000
*                             END;                                 0395 00974000
*                           CALL IORTN;/* ISSUE EXCP TO PRIME BUFFER */ 00975000
@RF00364 BAL   @14,IORTN                                           0396 00976000
*                         END;                                     0397 00977000
*                     END;                                         0398 00978000
*                   ELSE            /* IF LRECL¬=RECORD LEN THEN...  */ 00979000
*                     RTNCODE=RCIPLT;/* INDICATE INVALID PARMLIST    */ 00980000
         B     @RC00286                                            0399 00981000
@RF00286 LA    RTNCODE,16                                          0399 00982000
*                 ELSE              /* INVALID PARAMETER LIST EXISTS */ 00983000
*                   RTNCODE=RCIPLT; /* SET RETURN CODE               */ 00984000
         B     @RC00285                                            0400 00985000
@RF00285 LA    RTNCODE,16                                          0400 00986000
*               END;                                               0401 00987000
*             ELSE                  /* IF UCB POSTED NOT           0402 00988000
*                                      READY,THEN...                 */ 00989000
*               DO;                 /* DO THE FOLLOWING              */ 00990000
         B     @RC00282                                            0402 00991000
@RF00282 DS    0H                                                  0403 00992000
*                 HEADER=IRVHDR;    /* BUILD IRV HEADER FOR USER     */ 00993000
         L     @14,DCBHDR(,DCBPTR)                                 0403 00994000
         MVC   HEADER(12,@14),IRVHDR                               0403 00995000
*                 RTNCODE=UCERR;    /* SET UNIT CHECK ERROR CODE     */ 00996000
         LA    RTNCODE,20                                          0404 00997000
*                 NOMSGFLG=ON;      /* INDICATE NO MSG WANTED      0405 00998000
*                                                            @YM00612*/ 00999000
         MVI   NOMSGFLG(RCORE),X'01'                               0405 01000000
*               END;                                               0406 01001000
*             WTPMSG=MSG3890;       /* SET 3890 MSG TEXT             */ 01002000
@RC00282 MVC   WTPMSG+16(64,RCORE),MSG3890                         0407 01003000
*/**************************                                         */ 01004000
*/* LOAD 3890 CU SUBROUTINE                                          */ 01005000
*/**************************                                         */ 01006000
*                                                                  0408 01007000
*LOAD3890:                          /* LOAD 3890 CONTROL UNIT        */ 01008000
*             PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                     0408 01009000
         B     @PB00002                                            0408 01010000
LOAD3890 DS    0H                                                  0409 01011000
*             RESPECIFY                                            0409 01012000
*               RTNPTR RSTD;                                       0409 01013000
*             RTNADDR=RTNPTR;       /* SAVE RETURN ADDRESS           */ 01014000
         ST    RTNPTR,RTNADDR(,RCORE)                              0410 01015000
*             CCWADDR=DATAPTR;      /* PUT DATA ADDRESS INTO CCW     */ 01016000
         STCM  DATAPTR,7,CCWADDR(CCWPTR)                           0411 01017000
*             DO WHILE(COUNT>0);    /* DO UNTIL CCW COUNT DEPLETED   */ 01018000
         B     @DE00412                                            0412 01019000
@DL00412 DS    0H                                                  0413 01020000
*               IF COUNT>MAXCNT THEN/* DOES COUNT EXCEED WRITE LIMIT */ 01021000
         CLC   COUNT(4,RCORE),@CF00287                             0413 01022000
         BNH   @RF00413                                            0413 01023000
*                 CCWCOUNT=MAXCNT;  /* YES,SET CCW COUNT TO LIMIT    */ 01024000
         MVC   CCWCOUNT(2,CCWPTR),@CH00287                         0414 01025000
*               ELSE                /* ELSE,                         */ 01026000
*                 CCWCOUNT=COUNT;   /* CCWCOUNT EQUALS REMAINING   0415 01027000
*                                      COUNT                         */ 01028000
         B     @RC00413                                            0415 01029000
@RF00413 L     @12,COUNT(,RCORE)                                   0415 01030000
         STH   @12,CCWCOUNT(,CCWPTR)                               0415 01031000
*               CALL IORTN;         /* WRITE BLOCK OUT TO CONTROL  0416 01032000
*                                      UNIT                          */ 01033000
@RC00413 BAL   @14,IORTN                                           0416 01034000
*               IF RTNCODE¬=NOERROR THEN/* IF AN I/O ERROR OCCURS  0417 01035000
*                                      THEN...                       */ 01036000
         LTR   RTNCODE,RTNCODE                                     0417 01037000
         BZ    @RF00417                                            0417 01038000
*                 COUNT=CONST000;   /* ZERO COUNT                    */ 01039000
         SLR   @12,@12                                             0418 01040000
         ST    @12,COUNT(,RCORE)                                   0418 01041000
*               CCWADDR=CCWADDR+MAXCNT;/* PREPARE TO BUILD NEXT LOAD    01042000
*                                      CCW                           */ 01043000
@RF00417 LA    @12,256                                             0419 01044000
         L     @11,CCWADDR-1(,CCWPTR)                              0419 01045000
         LA    @11,0(,@11)                                         0419 01046000
         ALR   @12,@11                                             0419 01047000
         STCM  @12,7,CCWADDR(CCWPTR)                               0419 01048000
*               COUNT=COUNT-MAXCNT; /* DECREMENT LOAD COUNT          */ 01049000
         L     @12,COUNT(,RCORE)                                   0420 01050000
         SL    @12,@CF00287                                        0420 01051000
         ST    @12,COUNT(,RCORE)                                   0420 01052000
*             END;                  /* RETURN TO MAINLINE ROUTINE    */ 01053000
@DE00412 L     @12,COUNT(,RCORE)                                   0421 01054000
         LTR   @12,@12                                             0421 01055000
         BP    @DL00412                                            0421 01056000
*             RTNPTR=RTNADDR;       /* RESTORE RETURN ADDRESS        */ 01057000
         L     RTNPTR,RTNADDR(,RCORE)                              0422 01058000
*             RESPECIFY                                            0423 01059000
*               RTNPTR UNRSTD;                                     0423 01060000
*           END LOAD3890;                                          0424 01061000
@EL00002 DS    0H                                                  0424 01062000
@EF00002 DS    0H                                                  0424 01063000
@ER00002 BR    @14                                                 0424 01064000
@PB00002 DS    0H                                                  0425 01065000
*     END;                                                         0425 01066000
*   ELSE                            /* UNSUPPORTED DEVICE            */ 01067000
*     DO;                           /*                       @YM02524*/ 01068000
         B     @RC00276                                            0426 01069000
@RF00276 DS    0H                                                  0427 01070000
*       RTNCODE=RCIPLT;             /* SET INVALID PARM LIST RTN CODE*/ 01071000
         LA    RTNCODE,16                                          0427 01072000
*       NOMSGFLG=ON;                /* INDICATE NO MESSAGE WANTED    */ 01073000
         MVI   NOMSGFLG(RCORE),X'01'                               0428 01074000
*     END;                                                         0429 01075000
*   END;                            /*                       @YM02524*/ 01076000
*   ELSE                            /* INVALID DCB SET RTN CODE      */ 01077000
*     DO;                           /*                       @YM02524*/ 01078000
         B     @RC00160                                            0431 01079000
@RF00160 DS    0H                                                  0432 01080000
*       RTNCODE=RCIPLT;             /* SET RTNCODE INVALID PARM LT   */ 01081000
         LA    RTNCODE,16                                          0432 01082000
*       NOMSGFLG=ON;                /* INDICATE NO MESSAGE WANTED    */ 01083000
         MVI   NOMSGFLG(RCORE),X'01'                               0433 01084000
*     END;                          /*                       @YM02524*/ 01085000
*                                                                  0434 01086000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01087000
*   /*                                                               */ 01088000
*   /* ******** CLEAN UP ROUTINE TO : *PLACE RETURN CODE IN REGISTER */ 01089000
*   /* 15 *FREE UP SETDEV WORK AREA * RETURN TO CALLER VIA SVC 3     */ 01090000
*   /*                                                               */ 01091000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01092000
*                                                                  0435 01093000
*CLEANUP:                                                          0435 01094000
*   TCBPTR=RTNCODE;                 /* SAVE RETURN CODE      @YM02520*/ 01095000
@RC00160 DS    0H                                                  0435 01096000
CLEANUP  LR    TCBPTR,RTNCODE                                      0435 01097000
*   IF RTNCODE¬=RCSUCC&             /* IF COMPLETION NOT SUCCESSF    */ 01098000
*       NOMSGFLG¬=ON THEN           /* AND NO MSG FLG NOT ON         */ 01099000
         LTR   RTNCODE,RTNCODE                                     0436 01100000
         BZ    @RF00436                                            0436 01101000
         CLI   NOMSGFLG(RCORE),X'01'                               0436 01102000
         BE    @RF00436                                            0436 01103000
*     DO;                                                          0437 01104000
*       SAVERC=RTNCODE;             /* SAVE ERROR RETURN CODE        */ 01105000
         ST    RTNCODE,SAVERC(,RCORE)                              0438 01106000
*       REG1=RTNCODE/4;             /* DETERMINE PROPER ERROR CODE   */ 01107000
         LR    REG1,RTNCODE                                        0439 01108000
         SRL   REG1,2                                              0439 01109000
*       MSGCODE=ERRCODES(REG1);     /* PUT ERROR CODE IN MESSAGE TEXT*/ 01110000
         LR    @14,REG1                                            0440 01111000
         ALR   @14,@14                                             0440 01112000
         LA    @12,ERRCODES-2(@14)                                 0440 01113000
         MVC   MSGCODE+16(2,RCORE),0(@12)                          0440 01114000
*       TCBPTR=DEBTCBAD;            /* INIT TCB POINTER FROM DEB     */ 01115000
         L     @14,DEBPTR(,RCORE)                                  0441 01116000
         L     TCBPTR,DEBTCBAD(,@14)                               0441 01117000
*       TIOTPTR=TCBTIO;             /* INITIALIZE TIOT POINTR FROM 0442 01118000
*                                      TCB                           */ 01119000
         L     @14,TCBTIO(,TCBPTR)                                 0442 01120000
         ST    @14,TIOTPTR(,RCORE)                                 0442 01121000
*       REG1=ADDR(TIOENTRY);        /* GET ADDR OF FRST ENTRY        */ 01122000
         L     REG1,TIOTPTR(,RCORE)                                0443 01123000
         LA    REG1,TIOENTRY(,REG1)                                0443 01124000
*       TIOTPTR=TIOTPTR+DCBTIOT-(REG1-TIOTPTR);/* POINT TO DD ENTRY     01125000
*                                      IN TIOT                       */ 01126000
         LH    @14,DCBTIOT+40(,DCBPTR)                             0444 01127000
         AL    @14,TIOTPTR(,RCORE)                                 0444 01128000
         LR    @12,REG1                                            0444 01129000
         SL    @12,TIOTPTR(,RCORE)                                 0444 01130000
         SLR   @14,@12                                             0444 01131000
         ST    @14,TIOTPTR(,RCORE)                                 0444 01132000
*       MSGDDN=TIOEDDNM;            /* MOVE DDNAME INTO MGS FROM TIOT*/ 01133000
         L     @14,TIOTPTR(,RCORE)                                 0445 01134000
         MVC   MSGDDN+16(8,RCORE),TIOEDDNM(@14)                    0445 01135000
*       REG1=ADDR(WTPMSG);          /* SET PTR TO MSG AREA           */ 01136000
         LA    REG1,16(,RCORE)                                     0446 01137000
*       GEN(SVC  35       ISSUE WTP );                             0447 01138000
         SVC  35       ISSUE WTP                                        01139000
*       RTNCODE=SAVERC;             /* RESTORE ERROR CODE            */ 01140000
         L     RTNCODE,SAVERC(,RCORE)                              0448 01141000
*       TCBPTR=RTNCODE;             /* SAVE RETURN CODE      @YM02505*/ 01142000
         LR    TCBPTR,RTNCODE                                      0449 01143000
*     END;                                                         0450 01144000
*   REG0=FREECORE;                  /* GET SUBPOOL AND CORE SIZE FOR    01145000
*                                      FREEMAIN              @YM02505*/ 01146000
@RF00436 L     REG0,FREECORE(,RCORE)                               0451 01147000
*   REG1=RCORE;                     /* GET ADDRESS OF WORK AREA      */ 01148000
         LR    REG1,RCORE                                          0452 01149000
*   GEN(FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)  FREE UP CORE IN SUBPOOL 0);/* Y02870*/ 01150000
         FREEMAIN R,LV=(0),A=(1)  FREE UP CORE IN SUBPOOL 0             01151000
*   RTNCODE=TCBPTR;                 /* GET RETURN CODE       @YM02520*/ 01152000
         LR    RTNCODE,TCBPTR                                      0454 01153000
*   GEN(SVC 3            RETURN TO USER VIA SVC 3 );               0455 01154000
         SVC 3            RETURN TO USER VIA SVC 3                      01155000
*                                   /* CODE AND RETURN TO CALLER     */ 01156000
*/*********************************************                      */ 01157000
*/* LOAD MODULES FROM SYS1.IMAGELIB SUBROUTINE                       */ 01158000
*/*********************************************                      */ 01159000
*                                                                  0456 01160000
*LOAD:                              /* LOAD MODULE FROM SYS1.IMAGELIB*/ 01161000
*   PROC OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                               0456 01162000
*                                                                  0456 01163000
         B     @PB00003                                            0456 01164000
LOAD     DS    0H                                                  0457 01165000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01166000
*   /*                                                               */ 01167000
*   /* THIS PROCEDURE DOES THE FOLLOWING (1) OPENS SYS1.IMAGELIB (2) */ 01168000
*   /* USES THE BLDL MACRO TO FIND A MEMBER OF IMAGELIB (3) USES THE */ 01169000
*   /* LOAD MACRO TO LOAD THE MEMBER INTO CORE (4) RETURNS THE       */ 01170000
*   /* ADDRESS OF THE MEMBER IN REG 0 (5) RETURNS A RETURN CODE IN   */ 01171000
*   /* REG 15 (6) CLOSE SYS1.IMAGELIB                                */ 01172000
*   /*                                                               */ 01173000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01174000
*                                                                  0457 01175000
*   RIMG=0;                         /* PREPARE TO OPEN SYS1.IMAGELIB */ 01176000
         SLR   RIMG,RIMG                                           0457 01177000
*   GEN(SVC 105                        OPEN SYS1.IMAGELIB);        0458 01178000
         SVC 105                        OPEN SYS1.IMAGELIB              01179000
*   IF RTNCODE=NOERROR THEN         /* IF IMAGELIB OPENED WITHOUT    */ 01180000
         LTR   RTNCODE,RTNCODE                                     0459 01181000
         BNZ   @RF00459                                            0459 01182000
*     DO;                           /* ERROR,THEN DO THE FOLLOWING...*/ 01183000
*       IMGDCBA=RIMG;               /* SAVE ADDRESS OF IMAGELIB DCB  */ 01184000
         ST    RIMG,IMGDCBA(,RCORE)                                0461 01185000
*       BLDLIST=''B;                /* INITIALIZE BLDLIST AREA       */ 01186000
         XC    BLDLIST(64,RCORE),BLDLIST(RCORE)                    0462 01187000
*       BLDPARMS=ONE58;             /* NUMBER AND LENGTH BLDL ENTRIES*/ 01188000
         MVC   BLDPARMS(4,RCORE),ONE58                             0463 01189000
*       BLDNAME=MEMBER;             /* NAME OF MODULE TO LOAD        */ 01190000
         MVC   BLDNAME(8,RCORE),MEMBER(NAMEPTR)                    0464 01191000
*       RBLD=ADDR(BLDLIST);         /* SET POINTER TO BLDL LIST      */ 01192000
         LA    RBLD,BLDLIST(,RCORE)                                0465 01193000
*       GEN(BLDL (1),(0)                RETRIEVE PDS DE INFORMATION  ); 01194000
         BLDL (1),(0)                RETRIEVE PDS DE INFORMATION        01195000
*       IF RTNCODE=NOERROR THEN     /* IF BLDL COMPLETED WITHOUT   0467 01196000
*                                      ERROR                         */ 01197000
         LTR   RTNCODE,RTNCODE                                     0467 01198000
         BNZ   @RF00467                                            0467 01199000
*         DO;                       /* THEN DO THE FOLLOWING...      */ 01200000
*           RIMG=IMGDCBA;           /* GET ADDRESS OF IMAGELIB DCB   */ 01201000
         L     RIMG,IMGDCBA(,RCORE)                                0469 01202000
*           RBLD=ADDR(BLDNAME);     /* SET PTR TO DIRECTORY ENTRY    */ 01203000
         LA    RBLD,BLDNAME(,RCORE)                                0470 01204000
*           GEN(LOAD DE=(0),DCB=(1)       LOAD MODULE INTO CORE);  0471 01205000
         LOAD DE=(0),DCB=(1)       LOAD MODULE INTO CORE                01206000
*           LDMODPTR=REG0;          /* PUT ADDR OF MOD LOADED IN P   */ 01207000
         LR    LDMODPTR,REG0                                       0472 01208000
*           RTNCODE=NOERROR;        /* INDICATE NO ERRORS OCCURED    */ 01209000
         SLR   RTNCODE,RTNCODE                                     0473 01210000
*         END;                      /* RETURN TO CALLER              */ 01211000
*       ELSE                        /* IF AN ERROR OCCURS DURING BLDL*/ 01212000
*         DO;                       /* THEN DO THE FOLLOWING...      */ 01213000
         B     @RC00467                                            0475 01214000
@RF00467 DS    0H                                                  0476 01215000
*           RTNCODE=BLDLERR;        /* SET BLDL ERROR CODE AND       */ 01216000
         LA    RTNCODE,4                                           0476 01217000
*           SAVERC=RTNCODE;         /* SAVE ERROR CODE FOR CLEAN-UP  */ 01218000
         ST    RTNCODE,SAVERC(,RCORE)                              0477 01219000
*         END;                                                     0478 01220000
*       RIMG=IMGDCBA;               /* SET PTR TO IMAGELIB DCB       */ 01221000
@RC00467 L     RIMG,IMGDCBA(,RCORE)                                0479 01222000
*       GEN(SVC 105                     CLOSE SYS1.IMAGELIB);      0480 01223000
         SVC 105                     CLOSE SYS1.IMAGELIB                01224000
*       RTNCODE=SAVERC;             /* RESTORE SETDEV RETURN CODE    */ 01225000
         L     RTNCODE,SAVERC(,RCORE)                              0481 01226000
*     END;                          /* RETURN TO CALLER              */ 01227000
*   ELSE                            /* IF IMAGELIB FAILS TO OPEN     */ 01228000
*     RTNCODE=IMGERR;               /* SET IMAGELIB ERROR CODE       */ 01229000
         B     @RC00459                                            0483 01230000
@RF00459 LA    RTNCODE,8                                           0483 01231000
*   END LOAD;                       /* RETURN TO CALLER              */ 01232000
@EL00003 DS    0H                                                  0484 01233000
@EF00003 DS    0H                                                  0484 01234000
@ER00003 BR    @14                                                 0484 01235000
*IORTN:                                                            0485 01236000
*   PROCEDURE OPTIONS(NOSAVE,NOSAVEAREA);                          0485 01237000
*                                                                  0485 01238000
IORTN    DS    0H                                                  0486 01239000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01240000
*   /*                                                               */ 01241000
*   /* **** I/O ROUTINE TO ISSUE EXCP TO LOAD DATA TO A DEVICE INPUT */ 01242000
*   /* TO PROCEDURE IS REG WITH ADDR OF IOB PREFIX ISSUE EXCP TO     */ 01243000
*   /* INITIATE I/O ISSUE WAIT FOR I/O FOR PERMANENT ERROR POST      */ 01244000
*   /* RETURN CODE OF X'0C'                                          */ 01245000
*   /*                                                               */ 01246000
*   /*****************************************************************/ 01247000
*                                                                  0486 01248000
*   RESPECIFY                                                      0486 01249000
*     RTNPTR RSTD;                                                 0486 01250000
*   REG1=IOBSTPTR;                  /* SET ADDR OF IOB FOR LOAD CMD  */ 01251000
         LR    REG1,IOBSTPTR                                       0487 01252000
*   GEN(EXCP  (1)            ISSUE EXCP TO START I/O );            0488 01253000
         EXCP  (1)            ISSUE EXCP TO START I/O                   01254000
*   REG1=IOBECBPT;                  /* SET PTR TO ECB FOR WAIT       */ 01255000
         L     REG1,IOBECBPT(,IOBSTPTR)                            0489 01256000
*   GEN(WAIT  ECB=(1)        WAIT FOR COMPLETION OF LOAD);         0490 01257000
         WAIT  ECB=(1)        WAIT FOR COMPLETION OF LOAD               01258000
*   IF ECBCC¬='7F'X THEN            /* TST IF I/O ERROR OCCUREDON LD */ 01259000
         L     @12,ECBPTR(,IOBSTPTR)                               0491 01260000
         CLI   ECBCC(@12),X'7F'                                    0491 01261000
         BE    @RF00491                                            0491 01262000
*     RTNCODE=RCPIOE;               /* SET PERM IO ERROR CODE        */ 01263000
         LA    RTNCODE,12                                          0492 01264000
*   ELSE                                                           0493 01265000
*     RTNCODE=NOERROR;              /* SET RETURN CODE FOR OK COMP   */ 01266000
         B     @RC00491                                            0493 01267000
@RF00491 SLR   RTNCODE,RTNCODE                                     0493 01268000
*   END IORTN;                                                     0494 01269000
@EL00004 DS    0H                                                  0494 01270000
@EF00004 DS    0H                                                  0494 01271000
@ER00004 BR    @14                                                 0494 01272000
*   END IGG08108                                                   0495 01273000
*                                                                  0495 01274000
